A Czerka Corporation whistleblower wants help avoiding his former employer's thugs. Have your companion slice Czerka's databanks and erase all information about him.
Aliases, contacts, accounts, known locations--<<1>> erased them all, leaving no trail for Czerka to follow. The grateful whistleblower was happy to pay for this service.
Fortune is Fickle
A casino on Elerion has evidence one of its high rollers is cheating. Have your companion slice the gambler's account to retrieve the unearned credits discreetly.
The details of the cheater's account show he's been into shady business across the planet Elerion. <<1>> traded this information for a hefty bonus.
Security Through Obscurity
Some criminal slicers constructed a data haven on the remote planet Kalis to store their pilfered secrets. Send your companion to uncover what they've stolen.
<<1>> not only found a wealth of criminal secrets, but left no traces in the data haven's records. The slicers continue to believe their data is uncompromised.
Hidden in the Jungle
The ornate golden locket you found hides the encryption key to a data cache on Onderon. Send your companion to locate it.
<<1>> found the data cache and cracked its encryption. It contained historical records about the royal family of Onderon that the government was more than happy to pay for.
The Fly on the Wall
Intelligence operatives have discovered a secret listening post orbiting Trandosha. Send a companion to slice the computers and find out what kind of intel has been gathered--and for whom.
<<1>> sliced the listening post computers, compiling a database of classified information leaked to the Republic as well as the identities of several undercover Republic agents in the region.
Profiteering
Someone at a mining outpost on Jondora is selling raw gems on the black market. Send your companion to slice the inventory records to track these illegal sales.
<<1>> sliced the inventory records on Jondora, exposing the guilty supply officer as well as his list of customers. Imperial authorities have rounded up everyone involved.
Finding Our Way
Archaeologists are trying to restore dozens of star charts discovered in computer banks in the ancient ruins of Laria. Send your companion to assist.
<<1>> painstakingly restored the ancient star charts along with many notes written in a forgotten language. The Jedi Council was generous with its thanks.
Shady Dealings
Swendo, a government official on Fresia, is rumored to be in the enemy's pocket. Send your companion to slice into his financial records to find the truth.
<<1>> sliced Swendo's financial records and discovered several payments from Imperial sources, along with a list of other officials on the take. Fresian authorities arrested the traitors.
The Aratech Bounty
The Aratech Company is offering a massive bounty to any slicer who can crack its prototype security grid. How can your companion resist the challenge?
<<1>> sliced through Aratech's new security grid and was able to sneak out some interesting data as well as receive the impressive bounty.
Taking Back Control
A rogue slicer has taken over the onboard systems of a space station on the Corellian Trade Spine. Send your companion to counter-slice her control programs.
<<1>> restored control of the station to its rightful owners, and even traced the slicer back to her location, leading to her arrest.
Extinguish the Sun
Authorities have been trying to shut down raids by Black Sun pirates. Have your companion slice the pirates' communications to find where they'll strike next.
<<1>> identified the comm frequency and encryption codes of the Black Sun pirates, and the authorities were generous in their gratitude.
Plug the Leak
Kal-Reyon Laboratory's cybernetics research is being leaked onto the HoloNet by an anonymous source. Have your companion trace the leaks to their origin.
<<1>> traced the leak back to one of the company's own executives, who was selling secrets to the highest bidder.
Mysterious Funds
Farrat Wrool, a small-time smuggler, has inexplicably become a wealthy crime boss almost overnight. Have your companion slice his systems to find out how.
It seems Farrat Wrool secretly stole his fortune piecemeal from a number of other crime lords. <<1>> turned over the information for a sizable reward.
A Test of Intelligence
The holodisc you found is the long-lost journal of brilliant slicer Naal Turro. Have your companion traverse its labyrinthine puzzles and learn its secrets.
<<1>> unlocked the encryption on an entire chapter of the journal, granting access to a portion of Naal Turro's abundant knowledge.
Data Race
An automated surveillance ship has crashed on the planet Kajim. Send your companion to retrieve the ship's datacore before enemy agents find it.
Using the crashed surveillance ship's automated defenses, <<1>> drove away the Republic retrieval team allowing the entire ship to be reclaimed by the Empire!
Devoted to Duty
A dead colonel's security codes were recently used to requisition military equipment. Send your companion to trace who's responsible.
<<1>> found a Republic spy had obtained the Moff's codes. A strike team has taken care of him, and <<1>> was rewarded with some of his stolen inventory.
The Azure Databanks
Excavators on Anaxes have found ancient databanks from the Azure Imperium. They're offering big rewards to any slicer who can restore the data; send your companion.
<<1>> patiently sliced into the old databanks and restored almost all of the information they once held. Delighted, the excavators doubled their reward.
Whispers on the Net
The crack slicer nicknamed "Whisper" has been assassinated by the enemy. Have your companion retrieve Whisper's data before the enemy does.
Whisper's security was tough, but <<1>> managed to slice through it, grab his data, and even leave a little surprise for the Imperials.
An Old Man's Treasure
An eccentric old noble plans to leave his antiques--including a valuable hyperspace map--to the enemy. Your companion must blackmail him into changing his mind.
<<1>> convinced the old nobleman that if he refuses to change his will, you'll find ways to ruin his legacy and turn him into a historical monster. Reluctantly, he's pledged his cooperation.
Strange Bedfellows
An enemy spy recently revealed himself to extend an offer of cooperation, provided the right terms are met. Send a companion to strong-arm the spy to your cause.
<<1>> threatened the spy with a false order for his assassination, securing his support for free.
A Night on the Town
The galaxy's elite are heading to the Ambassadors' Ball... bringing all their old grudges and rivalries. Your companion could keep everyone's minds on the party.
Disguised as an ambassador, <<1>> kept the partygoers from stabbing each other over the canapes, and even received a magnificent gift from a drunken envoy.
A Cure for What Ails You
A corporation has discovered the cure to the deadly C5H4 virus, but refuses to release it to the public. Have your companion negotiate the purchase of the cure and release it.
<<1>> not only convinced the corporation to release the cure, but to establish clinics for its distribution, free of charge.
Collusion
Several conspirators are plotting to supplant the governor of an enemy-controlled world; send your companion to collaborate with this coup.
<<1>> put the conspirators in contact with the necessary people to accomplish their coup, and they intend to repay that assistance.
Thrill Seekers
The wealth of Eleo Duboir recently passed to his twin sons, both daredevils in the extreme, and the executor of Eleo's estate needs help reigning in their dangerous behavior.
<<1>> convinced the young men that their father's business was important to many others' livelihoods, and they agreed to tone down their activities to ensure stability.
Know Too Much
A thief possessing military secrets has been captured by the Hutts. Have your companion convince the Hutts to execute him rather than risk his information leaking.
<<1>> made a convincing argument for the thief's execution, and the Hutts agreed to not only execute him, but offered you his possessions as a sign of good faith.
Lost in the Mist
A distress call is coming from within the Orixon Nebula, declared off-limits by the Hutts. Send your companion to negotiate passage for a rescue ship.
The distress call was from an ancient derelict ship. <<1>> bartered with the Hutts for salvage rights and found a relic from the Great Hyperspace War.
Without a Fight
Nelvaan is the only unaligned world in the Koobi system. Send your companion to convince Nelvaan's primitive locals to sign a treaty.
Thanks to <<1>>'s clever persuasion, the simple Nelvaanians believe the Empire has a perfect right to their world. They might make useful slaves.
First Impressions
Reports suggest that a neutral planet in the Outer Rim is considering a diplomatic alliance. Have your companion deliver an incentive.
<<1>> delivered the incentives to the planetary leaders, who felt it only fair to send a gift in return.
Double Dare
The Dug are a notoriously surly species who place a high value on pride and bravado, which makes them easy to provoke and manipulate. Help a wily diplomat take advantage of this.

<<1>> provoked the Dug into attacking their neighboring systems in a show of military might. The Empire should be able to swoop in and lay claim to the whole region after war weakens it for a few years.
Balancing Acts
Dangerous Gank mercenaries have been sighted in friendly territory. Attacking the Ganks might anger their Hutt employers; send your companion to convince them to leave quietly.
The Ganks were clearly intending to raid Imperial worlds, but <<1>>'s warnings sent them packing--and they left some interesting equipment behind.
Scorned
A governor's mistress is writing a tell-all book about the government's dirty secrets. Send your companion to stop the book's publication.
<<1>> convinced the Senator's mistress that tell-all books are out of style, and she's working on a romance novel instead.
The Prisoner's Fate
An enemy admiral has been captured, and several influential citizens are demanding his summary execution. Send your companion to ensure fair treatment.
After <<1>> argued for his fair treatment, Moff Gachial revealed a great deal of useful intelligence. The Republic SIS sends its regards.
Spin
Rumors of military skirmishes in independent systems are becoming disconcertingly widespread. Send a companion to convince the HoloNet reporters in those systems to change their stories.
<<1>> eloquently and ably convinced HoloNet broadcasters in the independent systems to recant all previous reports of fighting.
Small Steps
A diplomatic envoy is about to make contact with a new alien species in the Outer Rim. Hopefully, your companion can ensure everything goes smoothly.
After a successful first encounter, the aliens adopted the first contact team--and <<1>>--into their clan, presenting them with several strange gifts.
Lifeblood of the Galaxy
A powerful slave trade broker has an opening on his client list. Ensure you get his goods and contacts; send your companion to represent you.
After hours of haggling, <<1>> made you one of the slave broker's premium clients! You're already reaping the benefits.
Artificial Curiosity
A scout ship discovered an artifact containing a Gree artificial intelligence... which suddenly took control of the ship. Perhaps your companion can reason with it?
<<1>> befriended the Gree intelligence, which revealed many fascinating secrets before abruptly shutting off. At least the ship is safe.
Tug of War
The Exchange has captured a senior Republic SIS agent and is taking offers for him from both sides. Send your companion to negotiate for him.
<<1>>'s offer of a full pardon for several imprisoned criminals was irresistible. The agent is en route, along with a little extra from the Exchange.
A Wanderer's Gifts
An independent scout is investigating new hyperspace routes. If your companion can negotiate safe passage for her, she's promised first pick of her discoveries.
<<1>> managed to get the scout diplomatic immunity, allowing her to venture into more uncharted regions. The scout sent you a strange artifact she found.
See, Hear, Speak
Three trade consortiums want a monopoly on the Dustig Trade Route; all three are offering secret deals to get it. Send your companion to ensure you benefit most.
<<1>> secretly made overtures to all three trade consortiums, getting a much better deal before helping one of them triumph.
An Unjust Sentence
Scouts have found a valuable, forgotten prison ship from the Mandalorian Wars, crewed by the descendants of its original criminals. Have your companion negotiate for the ship.
<<1>> reassured the suspicious prison ship crew. After watching history vids, they have agreed to work for your side, and even offered a few valuables once owned by the prisoners.
Spontaneous Blackmail
The datapad you've found contains compromising holovideos of politicians from a neutral planet. Have your companion take the holovid to make them pick a side--yours.
The politicians were shocked that their crimes had been recorded, and immediately agreed to end their neutrality.
Broken Frame
You found a datapad belonging to a slicer who clearly framed someone else for his crimes on Utapau. Have your companion take the datapad and clear the victim's name.
<<1>> convinced the authorities on Utapau that the evidence was genuine, and the victim of the slicer's frame job has finally gone free.
Youthful Indiscretions
The son of a veteran officer has been arrested on Nar Shaddaa for an embarrassing indiscretion. Send your companion to secure his release--and gratitude.
After <<1>> quietly paid off his jailers, the commander's son offered a family heirloom as thanks, and has promised more favors in the future.
Uncovering Old Grudges
Two wealthy families have both claimed an ancient relic on Iktotch, and are on the verge of war. Send your companion to calm the situation.
<<1>> discovered the relic was an ancient symbol of friendship between both families. Now allies, they offered <<1>> the relic itself as thanks.
Under the Table
Police are clamping down on spaceport bribe-taking... but bribes keep trade running smoothly. Have your companion ensure the police don't make everyone too honest.
<<1>> not only reduced the penalties for bribe-taking, but all sorts of useful legal back doors have opened up for independent traders.
Just Remember Everyone's Name
A naive young official has accidentally offended several alien dignitaries since being appointed. Send your companion to tutor him in diplomatic protocol.
After <<1>>'s patient coaching, the Senator made several formal apologies--and gained several new allies. He presented <<1>> with a family heirloom as thanks.
Gifted
The Hutt Cartel is offering valuable blackmail material... at an exorbitant price. Your companion could arrange a better deal.
<<1>> held out until the Hutt Cartel agreed to improve the deal: the slaves, now including a captive Jedi, are on their way.
The Path Not Taken
The governor of an enemy-controlled moon may be willing to defect. Your companion might convince her to change sides without bloodshed.
<<1>> befriended the governor and convinced him to secede from the Republic! The governor even passed along his military databases and weapon stockpiles.
Personal Space
An arrogant warlord has been hunting friendly scout ships that enter his territory. Your companion could convince him to hunt enemy convoys instead.
Over a lengthy conversation with <<1>>, the warlord signed a mercenary contract and has already sent the plunder from one of his raids.
Bound by Trade
An Alsakan noblewoman is refusing a marriage alliance, intended to safeguard Mid Rim trade for generations. Send your companion to reason with her.
The noblewoman was objecting to the trade agreement, not the marriage. <<1>>'s new version impressed her and the Mid Rim traders, who sent their regards.
Making a Change

A disillusioned Exchange boss plans to retire from his life of crime, but his associates don't want to see the information he knows becoming public. Your companion could reap a substantial reward by ensuring that the "retiree" never talks.
<<1>> got the Exchange boss asylum, a personal bodyguard and a luxurious new home. In return, you have thirty years of Exchange files and information.
Blind Hatred
The warlords Anathel and Xarion are battling in the Stygian Caldera, disrupting valuable trade. Your companion could persuade them to take their feud elsewhere.
After <<1>>'s patient negotiations, both Sith Lords have gone to fight in the Outer Rim... though not before both sides tried to bribe <<1>> handsomely.
Blades to Be
Huge seams of cortosis ore have been found on Temesher, beneath a revered graveyard used by the natives' warriors. Have your companion persuade the locals to allow mining on their sacred site.

<<1>> convinced the local government to allow mining to occur on the sacred site--so long as the governors receive a share of the profits. They happily allowed the mining, and even gave <<1>> a small gift.
Red Tape
A large group of Ithorian refugees has been refused asylum. Send your companion to argue the refugees' case.
Not only did <<1>> get asylum for the Ithorians, the Republic Senate issued an apology and sent the Ithorians a relief package.
Reconciliation

Czerka Corporation is attempting to pay reparations to the descendents of Ithorian colonists wronged during the early stages of the Telos restoration, but the Ithorians are resisting accepting the offer.
<<1>> convinced the Ithorians that Czerka's intentions were actually genuine, and the two groups have begun trading after years of bad blood.
Backbiting
A wealthy celebrity with a long-time rivalry wants someone to discreetly spread some ugly rumors about her rival. Send your companion to help the lady out.
<<1>> lured the celebrity's rival into the middle of a massive smuggling operation, just as authorities cracked down. The celebrity is thrilled.
A Line in the Sand
The discovery of a new aquifer on Tatooine has several water barons fighting over ownership. Send a companion to mediate the dispute before it ends in violence.
<<1>> persuaded one of the water barons to pledge a portion of his profits in exchange for official support, forcing the competition to back down.
Stellar Summits
The space lanes outside of Toydaria have become almost unusable due to conflicts between more than a dozen trading clans, and the Hutts want the lanes cleared.
<<1>> convinced the rival trading clans that the Hutts would wipe out their families unless they fell in line. They fell in line.
Trust No One
An undercover agent believed dead was spotted hiding in the slums of Nar Shaddaa. Send a companion to convince the agent to return home before he runs off again.
<<1>> convinced the paranoid agent that he hadn't been hung out to dry and that Command really just wanted him back home in one piece.
Boardroom Hostility
An independent corporation is selling advanced weapon technologies to both sides. Send your companion to force them to be more patriotic.
<<1>> made a mess of the corporation's headquarters, prompting them to quickly cease sales to the enemy.
Lost Memories
You've found a journal signed by the murdered son of a famous Alderaanian nobleman, exonerating the man thought to be his killer. Have your companion deliver this new evidence.
The noble was moved to tears by the return of his son's journal, and happily assisted in freeing the man wrongfully accused of his son's death.
Prototypical Tactics
This crushed blaster is marked as a prototype from Kell Arms Corporation. Have your companion threaten to sell the parts to Kell's rivals unless they buy it back for a fortune.
<<1>>'s "sales pitch" was very persuasive, and Kell Arms Corporation has paid handsomely to get their work back.
Kidnappers
You've discovered a document proving that the ambassador's daughter was kidnapped by an underworld slave ring. Send a companion to negotiate for her release.
<<1>> was able to free not only the ambassador's daughter but several other kidnapped children and return them to their families.
Authoring History
You've found a valued artifact of the Krolu people, famously neutral in the galactic conflict. Send your companion with the artifact to convince them that the enemy stole it.
<<1>> was successful in manipulating the Krolu, and they've now joined your cause in the war.
Quiet, Please
Experiencing a midlife crisis, the head of Aratech plans to meditate in seclusion for a decade, making the company's future uncertain. Have your companion convince her to stay.
Darth Nacheria informed <<1>> that her meditation is to foresee the Empire's future, but she agreed to leave her armies in the Empire's hands.
Share and Share Alike
Intelligence agents are hoping to seize control of the Lan mining conglomerate, and need someone to convince shareholders to part with their holdings.
The Empire now holds a majority stake in the mining conglomerate thanks to <<1>>, and a portion of that success has been passed along to you.
Waters of Life
A new deposit of healing kolto has been discovered on Manaan, guarded jealously by the Selkath. Have your companion negotiate with them for the kolto.
<<1>> reminded the Selkath of their past friendship with the Republic. A treaty has been signed, and the chastened Selkath even sent a gift.
Star Struck
A popular holo-entertainer recently took a dissident stance against government policies. Have your companion persuade him to keep silent.
<<1>> coerced the celebrity into not only keeping quiet, but to retract his previous anti-Republic statements as well.
After Hours
A Kaas City noble is known to gossip about the city's politics in his favorite cantina. For the price of a drink, your companion could learn a great deal.
The noble accidentally told <<1>> a secret about the Minister of Logistics. Once he sobered up, he offered <<1>> a valuable gift to keep it quiet.
Broken Promises
The military gave an alien warlord weapons and support in exchange for fealty, but with all of his competition out of the way, the warlord is growing too ambitious.
<<1>> was able to convince the warlord's lieutenants to turn on him, and their new success has made them quite cooperative.
They Struck First
Revolutionaries on Halco claim that their government used a bioweapon against their forces. Send your companion to reveal the truth.
<<1>> discovered this "bioweapon" was a harmless gas leak, caused by the separatists themselves! Separatist recruitment has dropped, and the Senate sends its thanks.
Corporate Disinterests

New Horizons Development Corp, which is owned by a wealthy ally, is trying to purchase sharecropping lands from a collective of small farm-owners. Send a companion to persuade the farm-owners to sell.
<<1>> convinced the farm-owners to give up their lands in exchange for jobs working for New Horizons.
Professional Courtesy
After its CEO was killed in an orbital bombardment, Taerab Starship Manufacturing is refusing to build any more warships. Have your companion smooth things over.
Success! After <<1>> offered a formal apology and a discreet payment, Taerab Manufacturing has increased its Imperial contracts.
In Bad Faith

The primitive natives of Sembla are surrounded by large deposits of rare crystal and coral, which their nomadic people find little practical use. Convince the natives to let the Empire take what they don't use.
After speaking with <<1>>, the natives are content to let the Empire take what it wants if it offers tributes of simple tools and textiles.
Sparks will Fly
Fleets belonging to two rival warlords are both passing through the Corellian Run. Send your companion to ensure the warlords don't come to blows.
<<1>> managed to negotiate a truce between the warlords and was given a valuable gift to seal the deal.
Ugly Truths
The family of a fallen war hero has discovered that the true circumstances of their daughter's death have been concealed. Send a companion to ensure their silence.
After much negotiation, <<1>> struck a deal with the family of the war hero in exchange for their silence.
Toe the Line
There are stirrings of dissent on the planet Antamont. Your companion could quell this unrest before military reinforcements are needed.
<<1>> toured several of Antamont's cities, assuring the citizens of the Empire's goodwill. Reassured, the people are loyal once again.
Money Troubles
An influential Alderaanian lord has suffered a major financial loss, presenting a unique opportunity to sway the man's loyalties. Send a companion to take advantage.
<<1>> convinced the noble that the Empire knows how to take care of its friends, and he's pledged his allegiance to the Empire and House Thul.
On Both Their Houses
A plague has broken out on Delemede, but its governor is refusing medical aid to a group of refugees. Have your companion change his mind.
<<1>> reminded the governor that he could claim more Republic resources if he helped more people. The Imperial refugees are already being treated.
Marriage of Convenience
The wealthy owner of a speculative mining operation that hit it big is looking to get hitched for tax purposes, but he needs help finding a wife who'll agree to his prenuptial agreement.
<<1>> convinced a middle-aged Tapani noblewoman that this was her best chance at marriage.
Bargaining for Freedom
The enemy has captured two of our agents but are wary of a prisoner exchange after the last one ended in bloodshed. Send a companion to negotiate the exchange of the agents.
<<1>> negotiated for the agents' freedom without needing to hand over our own prisoners.
Diplomatic Intervention
Pirates have captured diplomats on their way to an important summit. Send a companion to negotiate for their release.
Thanks to <<1>>'s persuasion, none of the diplomats were harmed, and all were able to reach the summit on time.
Court of Public Opinion
A corporation with ties to the enemy is currently under investigation for environmental degradation; help the public find them guilty long before the authorities do.
<<1>> disseminated misinformation across the entire sector, whipping the people into a fervor and driving the company's value into the ground.
Justify the Means
Your faction's dealings with various criminal organizations has come under serious scrutiny; show the critics why organized crime is a necessary evil.
A combination of bribes, intimidations and scare tactics got the critics eating out of <<1>>'s hand. Things will be much quieter in the future.
Uncivil War
A prominent general on a strategically important Outer Rim world is threatening a coup. Send a companion to mediate between the general and the existing government.
<<1>>'s intervention prevented civil war and resulted in the creation of a loyal coalition government.
Denial of Service

A corporation critical of your government's interference in their bottom line is threatening to take its business elsewhere. Convince the Hutts to shut down the company's HoloNet access until they see reason.
The Hutts find the prospect of holding the company hostage rather entertaining and agree to assist without even needing to be paid for their trouble.
The Perils of Greed
A greedy Hutt is holding up a shipment of supplies to the research outpost at Aduba Six. Send your companion to convince the Hutt to release the shipment.
Thanks to <<1>>, the Hutt released the shipment and felt moved to add additional supplies for the research outpost, free of charge.
Forgetful Minds

A blackmailer has come forward seeking assistance coercing a wealthy businessman who has been neglecting to pay for the blackmailer's silence the past few months. Send your companion to persuade the businessman to resume his payments.
The businessman buckles under the pressure of <<1>>'s personal visit and resumes payment immediately, plus interest.
Saving Face
You have discovered a holorecording of confidential diplomatic negotiations, recorded by an underworld spy organization. Send your companion to negotiate for all copies of the holorecordings.
<<1>> recovered all the holorecordings and recruited the underworld organization to turn over its information on the enemy as well.
Breach of Contract
The datapad shows that a major weapons supplier plans to default on its contract and sell to the enemy. Send your companion to renegotiate the contract.
<<1>> renegotiated an even better contract, and the weapons corporation has pledged not to sell to the enemy.
Paying the Price
You have discovered a holorecording implicating the chief executive of MarTech Corporation in a price-fixing scheme. Send a companion to blackmail the executive.
<<1>> coerced the executive into paying you in MarTech technology.
Sentimental Value

You find an heirloom bearing the insignia of an Alderaanian noble house that was famously stolen years ago. It is of sentimental value only, but you should send your companion to see what the family will pay.
<<1>> threatened the family, and they agreed to pay triple what the object was worth.
Strained Negotiation
A Mandalorian clan is holding a small settlement on Kabray hostage. Have a companion reach a peaceful compromise with the deadly mercenaries.
<<1>> convinced the Ministry of Logistics to appoint a new liaison to the Mandalorian enclave, someone more agreeable to their nature.
Tough Love
An Alderaanian noble who shares lineage with a renowned smuggler would like to see this particular relation quietly escorted into exile and "forgotten."
The nobleman believed <<1>> intended to kill him and offered a substantial sum to guarantee his survival.
The Great Library's Secrets
The military hopes to install a long-range sensor outpost on Ropagi Two, but the Ropagu fear becoming an enemy target. Have your companion reassure them.
The Ropagu were reassured by <<1>>'s words and have even opened the Great Library's restricted sections to the Jedi.
Spark of Secession
The newly crowned monarch of Eiattu Six made the controversial move of declaring the planet's independence. Send a companion to try to reverse this rash decision.
It required some arm-twisting, but <<1>> convinced the prince that his planet was better off with the Republic.
Friends in Low Places
An allied smuggler was recently arrested for customs violations. Send a companion to ensure the smuggler is free to continue assisting the cause.
<<1>> got the Ministry of Logistics to issue the smuggler immunity from common customs laws as an official Imperial privateer.
Criminal Interest
Various government branches are at odds over engaging in trade with the Hutts. Send your companion to convince the naysayers of the value of the Hutt's commerce.
<<1>> succeeded in getting the Ministry of Logistics to relax its stranglehold on the spice trade, and the Diplomatic Service provided compensation for the assistance.
Dxun's Lost Warriors
An independent Mandalorian clan is demanding classified files about the moon Dxun, where their ancestors fought. Send your companion to work out an arrangement.
<<1>> convinced the Republic to open the Dxun files. The Mandalorians learned much about their ancestors, and thanked <<1>> with a gift.
Stopping the Leaks

An independent organization based on Nam'ta claims to have received thousands of diplomatic holorecords and is planning to release their contents to the HoloNet. Send a companion to convince the Nam'ta government to clamp down on this organization.
<<1>> convinced the Nam'ta government to arrest the organization's leader and recover the holorecords.
Patriots and Propaganda
A high-ranking diplomat is seeking patriotic travelers to spread propaganda around the galaxy. Have your companion help spread the diplomat's message.
<<1>>'s unique brand of charisma caught the interest of a number of colonial interest groups who seem willing to give life in the Empire a chance.
Depraved Indifference
A world ripe for toxic chemical testing refuses all corporate petitions. Have your companion convince them to change their minds.
<<1>> secured the government's silence and even secured a portion of the world to be governed under Imperial law.
The Core of the Problem
After a shipping magnate roundly criticized government import tarrifs, shipments of crucial materials have dropped dramatically. Have your companion get the shipping lanes flowing again.
<<1>> appealed to the citizens of Coruscant; outraged, they called for the Duros official's dismissal and submitted donations for rebuilding to continue.
Feuding Families
Two Tapani noble houses are on the brink of war after a marriage between house leaders was scandalously dissolved. Send a companion to negotiate your support for whoever makes the best offer.
<<1>> negotiated special technology from one of the noble houses, who crushed their enemy.
Bastion of Vice
Security forces have surrounded the last hideout of a criminal organization. An assault would be bloody; have your companion convince the criminals to surrender.
<<1>> convinced the entrenched criminals that jail time would be preferable to death, and the security forces were grateful.
Itchy Trigger Finger
A hotheaded commander on the front lines is anxious to attack despite incomplete preparations. Have your companion convince him to be reasonable.
<<1>> reasoned with the commander, talking him into waiting for proper supplies and reinforcements before beginning his attacks.
A Hard Day's Work
The workers on a vital asteroid mining station have stopped production, demanding greater pay. A visit from your companion could smooth things over.
<<1>> brokered a satisfying deal between the miners and their employers, giving the workers greater benefits and restarting the flow of resources.
Leave No One Behind
A squad of soldiers has been captured by enemy forces along the Republic-Imperial border. Send your companion to extract them--and inflict as much damage as possible to their captors.
Thanks to <<1>>'s arguments, the prisoners of war were released with only minor concessions required.
Ethical Practices
Blueshift Propulsion, an influential hyperdrive manufacturer, has elected a new chief executive. Have your companion help shift the company away from its former corrupt policies.
<<1>> not only proposed some ethical business models that impressed the Blueshift executive, but secured some important contracts with the company as well.
Schism
Two warlords threatening a major trade route have formed an alliance to secure their territories. Send your companion to sow seeds of mistrust between them.
<<1>> convinced the two warlords to accuse each other of treachery, sparking an all-out conflict between the former friends.
Whatever It Takes
The consul of Ishanna stubbornly refuses to open his system's mineral deposits to mining. Send your companion to bribe, coerce or blackmail him into cooperation.
<<1>> greased the right palms to turn Ishanna's representatives against the consul, forcing him to open their worlds to mining.
On the Brink
An upstanding magistrate serving on a station near Hutt Space has grown tired of constantly fighting organized crime. Your companion could convince him to finally look the other way.
With the promise of more credits for an easier job, <<1>> persuaded the magistrate to tolerate a "reasonable" amount of crime on his station.
Conserving Resources
Disgruntled veterans of the Great War have started demanding the medical treatment they deserve. Send your companion to bribe their leader into ending the complaints.
<<1>> negotiated with the most outspoken veteran, promising a large personal reward if he could convince his followers to take more meager handouts.
Out With the Old
The heir to the throne of Pavia has shown a desire to engage in galactic politics, against the monarch's wishes. Send your companion to arrange his ascension.
<<1>> provided counsel to the heir on Pavia, and they arranged for the current monarch to meet with an unfortunate accident.
Containment
You found plans detailing the Hutt Cartel's ambition to expand further into nearby systems. Send your companion to warn the authorities.
With <<1>>'s aid, local governments were on hand to shut down the cartel's attempts at establishing black markets on their worlds.
Fringe Science
The datapad you found details an unethical--but potentially valuable--research program being conducted on active duty military personnel. Your companion should make sure it's never discovered.
<<1>> helped to cover up the research program's activities and distribute misinformation about its intended purpose.
Douse the Fuse
An idealistic government official has been arrested on false accusations. Send your companion to speak on her behalf.
<<1>> managed to end the rising feud between the two Sith Lords before it turned to violence.
Public Relations
Lord Balionn-Gur wishes to rule his newly conquered planet through law and order, not fear and domination. Send your companion to help ensure his success.
<<1>> reassured the populace that the Sith governor is honest in his intentions, allowing the lord to establish order without the need for brutality.
Pulling Rank
An infantry officer has used his family's influence to secure a promotion to colonel despite a lack of experience. Have your companion arrange his swift removal.
<<1>> turned the scrutiny of an irate Sith Lord toward the Imperial officer, who soon failed to live up to the lord's particular expectations.
Unacceptable Offer
A neutral planet has refused all offers of alliance, and an unprovoked invasion would have negative political consequences. Send your companion to lure the planet into attacking first.

<<1>> presented an offer so offensive and one-sided, the neutral planet declared itself for the Republic and began attacking Imperial targets. With Imperial force justified, the fight won't last long.
Gone Too Far
Governor Fouchiert is trying to expose the cruel deeds of a corrupt but effective military commander. Send your companion to lend weight to his argument.
<<1>> persuaded the Senators to realize that the brutal commander was going against the ideals of the Republic, despite his successes.
Starting Fresh
A planet in the Inner Rim has overthrown its tyrannical monarchy and now seeks to establish an entirely new government. Send your companion as an advisor.
With the help of <<1>>, the planet formed a new government based on the principles of the Republic and began arranging free elections.
Too Dangerous to Live
A ruthless and cunning enemy commander has been captured and brought to trial. Your companion could make sure her sentence is death.
<<1>> recounted the terrible deeds the Imperial commander was responsible for--with only a few embellishments--and the military agreed to secretly execute the prisoner.
Status Quo
A young idealist is gaining popularity in his electoral race against a more "pragmatic" incumbent. Have your companion find some compromising information on the upstart.
Rumors have spread about the idealistic candidate's decadent personal life and ambitions for power, and <<1>> has received much gratitude from the sitting Senator.
Fight the Propaganda
Lies and misinformation about the war have been spreading among neutral populations. Have your companion ensure that the truth is known.
<<1>> fought the lies with facts but acknowledged the war is taking a toll, rendering the misinformation worthless among the neutral worlds targeted.
Disputed Succession
When the head of House Barnaba died without an heir, the family split in a bid for leadership. Send your companion to restore order.
<<1>> worked out a deal between the Barnaba family leaders, placing a well-liked and impartial candidate at the head of the noble house.
Cover Story
A spy working undercover against the Black Sun syndicate needs to make sure local security doesn't expose him. Have your companion make sure he's left alone.
<<1>> made arrangements for the agent to work without fear of local authorities. The infiltration of Black Sun will proceed, and information will flow.
Knife's Edge Politics
The rigid, tradition-bound leaders of Manari have made diplomatic negotiations difficult. Have your companion speed things along--by any means necessary.
<<1>> walked the fine line of etiquette perfectly, and the leaders of Manari were impressed at a foreigner's dedication to their ways.
Reunification

Political tension on Raskane Four has pushed the planet to the brink of civil war. Send your companion to determine which side would be most susceptible to future manipulations and ensure that they come out ahead.
<<1>> tactfully diffused the tensions on the planet, turning the political leaders' ire toward those who were most vocally in favor of starting a war.
A Better Use of Time
A biochemical corporation stumbled on the formula for a powerful toxin while performing medical research. Send your companion to shift the company's focus to weaponizing this toxin.
<<1>> stifled protests by more ethical members of the company and convinced it to produce and distribute the weaponized toxin in secret.
Show of Strength
The grand chieftain of a Nikto colony world believes his people can freely prey on passing ships. Send your companion to make him fear the consequences.
<<1>> intimidated the Nikto ruler during an unofficial visit, convincing him to make a brutal example of any of his people who engage in acts of piracy.
The Cost of Doing Business
The Broken Skull gangsters are willing to cheaply offer their services as suppliers and mercenaries if their rivals can be made to disappear. Have your companion make the arrangements.
<<1>> made deals with both sides of the law to get rid of the gangsters' rivals, opening the way for them to do business as they please.
Enforcing Contracts
A crime boss wants to back out of a deal he negotiated with the Hutt Cartel. Send your companion to inform him what'll happen if he does.
<<1>> let the crime boss know the penalties for backing out of a contract, and he relented in the face of the implied threat.
Neutrality is Relative
The Noonar Confederacy holds a key stretch of territory between the Republic and the Empire, but its policy is one of pacifism. Send your companion to twist its leaders into granting military access.
<<1>> cajoled the Noonar Confederacy into allowing temporary access to its space for supposedly nonmilitary purposes. It's the perfect setup for a surprise attack.
Double-Dealing
You found a holorecording containing evidence that Gladion Industries has been selling weapons to both sides in the war. Have your companion bring this information to light.
<<1>> exposed Gladion's unethical practices, forcing the company to shut down and pay reparations.
Taking Sides
The documents you recovered are vital treaties belonging to a staunchly neutral planet. Have your companion offer them back in exchange for an end to neutrality.
Threatening to destroy the treaties otherwise, <<1>> blackmailed the planet into taking sides in the war.
Noble Legacy
A family newly arrived on Alderaan has evidence of its ancestral links to the nobility. Have your companion help the family gain recognition.
<<1>> presented evidence of the family's ancestry to several Sith Lords, securing the family's rightful place in Imperial society.
Tact and Discretion
The previous alien leaders of a conquered world still have vital information in their possession. Send your companion to persuade them to share it.
<<1>> put on a display of charm and etiquette unlike anything the aliens had seen in the Empire. They were happy to reveal everything they knew about their former Republic allies.
Using the System
The parliament of Illodia will soon host elections, and a number of valuable allies are up for seats. Send your companion to help them get into office.
<<1>> persuaded the parliament to grant Imperial-friendly politicians key roles, assuring more cooperative relations in the future.
Strong-Arm Negotiations
A Hutt crime boss is selling tibanna gas at vastly inflated prices, citing increased demand. Have your companion find a replacement for the Hutt among his subordinates.
<<1>> found that one of the Hutt's advisors was willing to sell gas to the Empire for a cheaper price, and arranged for the Hutt to be forced into hiding.
Protection for the Deadly
A retired assassin is being hunted by the family of one of his marks. Have your companion offer him protection in exchange for his services.
<<1>> gave the assassin a promise that his hunters would never find him, and the Empire gained a new operative.
Attrition
A prominent military commander needs additional troops after losing most of them to his reckless attacks. Have your companion recruit some credulous mercenaries to fill the gap.
<<1>> contacted a mercenary organization and emphasized the high pay and low risk involved in the Sith Lord's operations.
Behavioral Correction
The professional rivalry of two factions of government officials has degraded into childish bickering. Have your companion remind the officials of their real duties.
<<1>> called out both factions in a meeting with other Senators, making the bickering politicians realize their mistakes and promise to stay professional.
Rules of Engagement
A company of mercenaries has been overstepping its bounds while on deployment to contested planets. Have your companion arrange the termination of the mercenaries' contract.
<<1>> exposed the aggressive and dangerous actions of the mercenaries, and the Senate was quick to cease its association with them.
Peaceful Annexation
A confederation of independent planets wants an alliance in exchange for military protection. Have your companion negotiate the treaty.
<<1>> convinced the planets to provide food, supplies and recruits to the Republic in return for membership, making the alliance beneficial for all parties.
Outright Sedition
A cadre of nobles on Alderaan are trying to gain support for aligning their family with the enemy. Send your companion to arrange their exile instead.
<<1>> fabricated evidence showing the noble as a traitor, and House Organa's members believed themselves fully right to exile him.
Immunity
A black market contact has been arrested by local authorities. Send your companion to get her off the hook.
<<1>> used every loophole in the book, getting the black market contact cleared of all charges without a single day in prison.
The Grass is Greener
A rampaging pirate fleet has been pillaging friendly convoys. Send your companion to make the enemy's ships seem like a better target.
<<1>> spread rumors along unscrupulous channels about the riches of the Empire's border planets, and the pirates immediately turned their rampage toward Imperial worlds.
The Visualization Engine
The techno-priests of Kaliska maintain a "visualization engine" designed to predict the future based on user input. Have your companion consult the machine.

<<1>> was allowed a consultation with the visualization engine by the techno-priests. The machine's predictions about your future were startlingly specific and could prove critical when certain events come to pass.
Mandalorian Weapons
Mandalorian armor and weaponry has been turning up in the hands of Outer Rim pirates. Have your companion find where this material is coming from.

<<1>> learned that the pirates have been obtaining Mandalorian weaponry from a clan of Mandalorian renegades, exiled for dishonor. You now know the Mandalorians' mark and how to recognize the clan's allies.
Explorer's Legacy
Yvellee Cha, renowned explorer and rumored smuggler, has announced her retirement. Send your companion to try and obtain her personal astrogation charts.
Yvellee turned over her astrogation charts and notes to <<1>>. These detailed a number of uncharted hyperspace routes, as well as several unique cultures and planets Yvellee visited.
Tech Boom
The Exchange recently made a fortune investing in several cutting-edge tech corporations. Send your companion to figure out how they've been so successful.
<<1>> discovered a list of corporate officials paid off by the Exchange. Using the list, <<1>> was able to convince the officials to part with valuable tech schematics.
Account Fraud
Recently, several InterGalactic Banking Clan executives have had their passwords compromised and their accounts sliced. Send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> traced the compromised passwords to a disgruntled former employee with a grudge against the IGBC. The culprit was apprehended, and the IGBC paid their promised reward.
Strange Survey
A survey team charting an uninhabited world in the Loraidia system have stumbled across some unusual readings. Send your companion to help them analyze the results.
<<1>> helped the survey team uncover a large deposit of maranium beneath the planet's surface. The valuable but radioactive ore was interfering with the survey readings.
The Duros Defector
The aide to a corporate official from Duro wants to defect. Send your companion to escort him into friendly space and debrief him.

<<1>> successfully exfiltrated the Senator's aide, who revealed strategic secrets about the Republic's military buildup near Alderaan, along with the names of Senators who might be sympathetic to the Imperial cause.
Black Sun's Radiance
Investigators are assembling a team to track the expansion of the Black Sun gang and determine its links with other syndicates. Have your companion join up.
<<1>>, along with the Senator's team, determined that Black Sun has expanded to multiple worlds beyond Coruscant and found evidence of the group's struggle against another syndicate, "the Exchange."
Fist of Justice
Government officials are assembling a team to track a group of mercenaries calling themselves "the Fist of Justice." Have your companion join the investigation.
<<1>> helped the team track the Fist of Justice to a base on Droxine. Imperial troops moved in and eliminated the threat, capturing the movement's leaders for interrogation.
Hit and Run
Pirates have been staging guerrilla attacks on convoys in the Chommell system. Send your companion to find their base of operations.
<<1>> discovered the pirates had several bases scattered throughout the sector. Republic strike forces were dispatched to each location to eliminate the threat.
Fate of Waskiro
The Waskiro colony has suddenly dropped out of contact. Send your companion to determine what could have silenced it so swiftly.
<<1>> found the Waskiro colony a smoking ruin. The few survivors report an attack by advanced combat droids of an unknown make, and offered what scraps remain for evidence.
Death of a Senator
The Senator from the tiny planet of Doan was assassinated. Send your companion to investigate the crime and find out who was involved.
The Doan Senator was killed by his subordinate. However, <<1>> found evidence that the subordinate was goaded into action by an Imperial agent posing as a Senate clerk.
Dangerous Auction
A legendary Kubaz information broker is auctioning off his secrets on the planet Gargon. You've obtained an invitation; send your companion to purchase.

<<1>> made it to the information broker's auction, where members of every species and criminal concern were present and bidding on one secret after another. Nonetheless, <<1>> outbid several other parties to claim particularly valuable data.
Journey into the Void
A deep space exploration vessel has returned from a journey outside the galactic rim, apparently empty. Have your companion retrieve its logs.

<<1>> found the derelict ship and disabled its defenses, finally downloading its fragmented log. The crew went mad three years into the expedition beyond the galactic rim, explaining their disappearance--but discovered some bizarre stellar phenomena in the process.
The Middleman
Phykkir Zee acts as a middleman for anyone hiring mercenaries in the Anoat Sector. Send your companion to obtain his contract list and learn every scheme he's involved in.
<<1>> obtained a full list of Phykkir Zee's mercenary contracts from his dissatisfied assistant--the opportunities seen by the underworld and others are now your opportunities.
Mind Control Messages
An anonymous tipster warns that subliminal messages are embedded in HoloNet propaganda. Have your companion analyze the data and the originating hardware.

<<1>> combed through a massive number of HoloNet advertisements and found no evidence of subliminal messages. However, it's clear that both the Republic and the Empire are attempting to trigger droid code through advertising. You'll be able to duplicate these triggers yourself, now.
The Treaty of Coruscant
Many details of the Treaty of Coruscant remain classified to this day, but could shed light on Republic and Imperial aims. Have your companion study the known data.

<<1>> thoroughly studied the public documents regarding the Treaty of Coruscant, and spoke to several low-level officials involved with its creation. It's becoming clearer who among the Senate and the Dark Council possessed real power at the time.
Prisoner's Plea
A mercenary who worked extensively for both Republic and Empire is now in prison. She'll tell everything to your companion in exchange for some luxuries.

<<1>> interviewed the prisoner, who provided extensive documentation of her time with the Republic and Imperial militaries as well as top secret data. In exchange, <<1>> arranged to reduce her sentence.
Never Printed, Never Broadcast
Choel Nyl, a famed war journalist, was presumed dead--but new evidence suggests he's alive and in hiding. Have your companion find him and learn what he knows.

<<1>> located the journalist living under an assumed name on Abhean. The journalist, in return for his privacy, reluctantly shared his notes. When pressed, he offered something more--the secret that drove him into retirement!
Playing the Odds
A secret group of crimelords has been betting, accurately, on the outcome of Republic-Imperial conflicts. Have your companion determine the group's methodology.

<<1>> gained access to the crimelords' personal information network, as well as their droid--a unit designed to analyze outcomes in the galactic conflict. With their data in your hands, the crimelords' bets won't be worth much anymore.
Listening Post
An allied listening post has been monitoring enemy signal traffic along the Rimma hyperlane. Have your companion join the post's crew to study and decrypt the signals.
<<1>> worked alongside the crew of the listening post to determine the enemy's low-level security codes.
The Geonosian Fortress
The insectoid Geonosians have gathered in an ancient lunar palace near the Hutt border. Your companion will infiltrate the palace and learn the Geonosians' purpose.

<<1>> gained access to the mysterious Geonosian palace and observed the insects at work--expertly uncovering their plan to turn the moon into an enormous hive, and obtaining their technological plans.
Trelli Secrets
This relic is emblazoned with the royal seal of Serreno's wealthy Trelli family. Send your companion to Serreno to find out how it ended up here.
<<1>> learned that the youngest son of Duke Trelli abdicated his birthright and fled his homeworld a century ago to marry a commoner, taking several family heirlooms with him.
Muun Documents
You've recovered a datapad written in an unfamiliar Muun dialect. Send your companion to Muunilinst to see if someone can decipher it.
<<1>> discovered the datapad was a digital copy of the original articles of incorporation of the InterGalactic Banking Clan. The head of the IGBC was eager to add it to their archives.
Assassin Hunt
Political strife has resulted in the assassination of a renowned (and sympathetic) diplomat. Have your companion find those responsible.
<<1>> consulted with the apprentices of Lord Lychosik and found that his own master, Darth Arho, ordered his execution. Darth Arho has offered a token in hopes of your silence.
Czerka's Secrets
The enormous and influential Czerka Corporation is rumored to be selling technology directly to black market dealers. Send your companion to infiltrate the organization.

<<1>> got inside a Czerka subsidiary and found evidence of managers selling weapons to the Empire. Czerka has dismantled the subsidiary and placed the managers in a company prison, offering its thanks.
Extreme Circumstances
Political extremists have staged seemingly unconnected revolts on a half-dozen planets. Have your companion determine who is backing these uprisings.

<<1>> found evidence of an underground network called the "Sons of Bachor" existing among the slaves, secretly pushing for rebellion and the bloody murder of Imperial slave owners, along with the sons' main supply cache.
Follow the Money
The mysterious Opal Foundation has been outbidding all rivals and hiring away prized bounty hunters. Send your companion to the foundation's headquarters on Koru Neimoidia to investigate.

On Koru Neimoidia, <<1>> discovered that the Opal Foundation is a front for an influential crimelord terrified of war, who's hiring bounty hunters for protection. He's put his resources at your disposal to keep him out of the galactic cross fire.
Missing Agent
A reconnaissance operative has disappeared in the refugee camps of Pencael Four. Have your companion save him--or recover his work.

The Pencael Four refugee camps were overcrowded and dangerous, but <<1>> managed to locate the spy--half-dead from disease, but well enough to be grateful for the rescue. He's now safely back on Coruscant.
The Augurs
Three Sineteen statisticians are holding a secret conference to predict likely outcomes of upcoming military engagements. Send your companion to observe.
<<1>> joined the secret conference of military officials and Jedi. The attendees weren't all in agreement over the Empire's next moves, but <<1>> managed to sift the best guesses from the worst.
The Spy's Dead Drop
An unknown operative has been delivering strategic secrets to a Tion diplomat. Have your companion locate the operative's dead drop and obtain those secrets.
<<1>> spotted the Republic spy embedding a data crystal into a necklace in a shop on Chommell Minor. <<1>> obtained the crystal and arranged to keep watch on the spy.
Digital Betrayal
Uulshos Manufacturing service droids have turned against the crew of a high-value cargo transport. Have your companion determine why the droids went bad.

<<1>> found a design flaw in the rogue droids' artificial intelligence. The flaw applies to all of Uulshos Manufacturing's products--evidence suggests a Republic saboteur is working at the company's highest levels.
Mantellian Separatists
The separatist movement on Ord Mantell has been badly damaged, but its leaders now seek to incite violence elsewhere. Have your companion find the roots of separatist support.
Tracking down the Mantellian separatist supporters wasn't easy, but <<1>> found that the separatists share financial backers with the Justicars of Coruscant!
The Gunrunners
A group of Anomid smugglers has approached certain underworld buyers, offering illegal armaments. Have your companion check up on the Anomids.
Posing as a potential customer, <<1>> got close to the Anomid weapons makers and learned their true motivation for helping the Republic--they hold a grudge against an Imperial Moff.
Cleaning House
The government of Hestria has shut down its notoriously corrupt secret police force. Send your companion to investigate the secret police files before the government destroys them.
On Hestria, <<1>> discovered a number of files detailing secret police involvement in numerous plots and conspiracies to influence the governments of all planets in the system.
Messages from the Past
Pirates in the Outer Rim recovered an ancient communications satellite. Send your companion to see if the pirates will part with their historical find.
<<1>> convinced the pirates to allow inspection of the comsat. It predated the Republic, and contained rare historical data, including astrogation maps of uncharted regions.
Independent Contractor
Authorities arrested Tertra Essa--an infamous freelance assassin--on Sennoa. Send your companion to interrogate her for details about previous clients and contracts.
<<1>> convinced Tertra Essa to reveal information about past jobs and her client list in exchange for a reduced prison sentence.
Into the Maw
An eccentric entrepreneur has financed an expedition to try and chart a course through the Maw, a cluster of black holes near Kessel. Send your companion to join the expedition.
While charting a course into the Maw, the expedition also cataloged a number of previously uncharted systems and worlds. <<1>> returned with a wealth of information.
Infidelity
A high-ranking military officer is suspected of having an affair. Investigate the rumors to see if his indiscretions have compromised security.
<<1>> confirmed the officer was involved with an undercover agent for the other side. The agent was arrested, and the officer will face appropriate disciplinary action.
Investigative Report
A journalist is preparing a holoreport focusing on corruption in both the Imperial and Republic military. Send your companion to investigate before the report is released.
<<1>> convinced the journalist to reveal the identity of corrupt military officers on both sides. He also agreed to delay his report until after the guilty officers were arrested.
Cursed
A survey team exploring the remnants of Malachor Five has been beset by equipment failures and ill fortune. Send your companion to investigate the rumored Curse of Malachor Five.
<<1>> discovered that a member of the survey team had been paid off by a rival corporation to sabotage the equipment. With the traitor removed, the survey was successfully completed.
Thick as Thieves
Reports indicate that leaders of the Exchange and the Hutt Cartel are having a meeting to discuss future business opportunities. Send your companion to spy on the meetings.
The Exchange and the Hutt Cartel were drafting an agreement to stay out of each other's territories to minimize competition. <<1>> was able to sabotage the negotiations.
Technocracy
A band of scientists and advanced droids have used superior technology to take control of a mining colony. Have your companion investigate and retrieve their data.

The scientists and droids who took over the colony hoped to gain independence and form their own nation state where "science reigns supreme." <<1>> was able to obtain portions of their research and prototype technology.
Code Blue
A rare entertainment holovid is rumored to contain encrypted secrets about the Republic military. Your companion should obtain and analyze the holovid.

<<1>> obtained the strange holovid, containing a simple dancer program. The code lists members of Republic High Command and contains a message from the designer--a slicer with Imperial sympathies, offering aid and information.
Half the Story
This item contains half of a binary code cipher; without the corresponding piece, the code is unbreakable. It looks to be of Duros manufacture; have your companion investigate.
<<1>> found the corresponding binary cipher on Duro; once decoded it revealed a long forgotten hyperspace route discovered by the famous Duros explorer Veeg Werdro.
Armchair Generals
You've recovered what appears to be an independently published academic study examining several key battles between Imperial and Republic forces. Have your companion analyze the study.
<<1>> analyzed the study and determined the authors had some fascinating and useful insights into the military strategy and tactics of both sides.
Mandalorian Property
This item is etched with the symbol of Clan Jennis of the Mandalorians. Send your companion to find out how it ended up here.
<<1>> learned that several members of Clan Jannis have been tracking down a shipment of stolen goods; they were grateful for the lead <<1>> provided them.
Czerka Insider
An anonymous contact inside the Czerka Corporation is offering to sell secrets to the highest bidder. Send your companion to make contact.
<<1>> made contact with Czerka's Imperial sympathizer. Together, he and <<1>> worked out a deal for him to sell corporate secrets to the Empire while sabotaging Republic shipments.
The Easy Way...
Underworld rumors suggest a new--and dangerous--hyperspace route has been discovered to Sacorria. Have your companion determine the truth.

<<1>> stowed away aboard a pirate vessel and discovered that the new hyperspace route to Sacorria is real--but gravimetrically unstable. There's treasure to be found in the derelict ships along the way.
Missing Operative
An operative working undercover on Jocal Four has disappeared. Send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> discovered the operative on Jocal Four faked his own death to escape his Imperial service. <<1>> recovered his mission notes and apprehended the rogue agent.
Charting the Future
Top military officials are meeting to discuss ways to increase the effectiveness of their troops. Send your companion to observe.
<<1>> infiltrated the meetings. The Republic officials discussed several strategies for the future... though thanks to <<1>>, the Empire will be able to counter their efforts quite effectively.
Swoop Gangs
A major swoop bike racing tournament begins shortly. Have your companion visit the tournament and determine the swoop gangs' links to underworld activity.

<<1>> determined that there's a rift between the swoop bike racers who stick to minor criminal offenses and those secretly funded by major Exchange crimelords or the Hutt Cartel. There are potential friends to be found in this part of the underworld.
Mystery Below the Cityscape
Famed "urban explorer" Bekos Maatu is arranging an expedition into the unmapped lower levels of Coruscant. Your companion could learn a great deal.
The expedition into the depths of Coruscant revealed whole sectors of lost technology--even city-dwellers cut off from the world above! <<1>> has returned with fascinating data and stories.
Chiss Rebels
Certain Chiss officials are secretly protesting the alliance with the Empire. Send your companion to find the agitators.
<<1>> tracked down the leader of the Mandalorian dissidents. He was arrested by Imperial authorities and gave up the names of everyone else involved during the interrogation.
Prototypes
A Gank mercenary crew has begun auctioning prototype armaments. Have your companion investigate the weapons' source.
<<1>> learned that the Anomid weapons makers have a grudge against a Republic general who spurned their initial offer. They're eager to help the Empire to get revenge.
Enemy Agent
An enemy agent wishes to defect--urgently. Send your companion to meet her on Nal Koska for a secret debriefing.
<<1>> gave the agent on Nal Koska safe passage to the Republic in exchange for details of the Imperial military buildup and a list of undercover Imperial agents.
Coded Messages
A listening post has intercepted coded messages sent by unknown vessels in the Mengal system. Send your companion to help decode the signals.
<<1>> worked with the listening post crew to decipher the intercepted Imperial messages, leading to the capture of an Imperial cargo freighter passing through the region.
Prodigal Son
A young man on Falleen claims to be the infamous "Lost Prince" who was kidnapped twenty years ago as a child. The royal family is looking for someone to verify his claims.
<<1>> exposed the Lost Prince as a fraud. When arrested, he confessed to being the son of one of the original kidnappers, admitting the real prince died many years ago.
Lost in Translation
A remote listening post picked up a seemingly urgent message in an unfamiliar language. Send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> identified the transmission as a distress call from the Primus Goluud system. Primus Goluud went nova centuries ago, wiping out whatever unknown civilization originally sent the message.
Multiple Malfunctions
A research team in the remote Herrik system has been experiencing numerous equipment failures and droid malfunctions. They suspect sabotage; send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> proved the malfunctions were due to a unique form of stellar interference emitted by Herrik's sun. The grateful scientists shifted the focus of their research to the unusual star.
Missing General
Colonel Frellder, a high-ranking military official on Tormin, has vanished. Authorities suspect foul play; send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> learned that Colonel Frellder was killed by his own men, who could no longer bear his harsh style of command. Military authorities arrested those involved.
Unidentified Remains
A body with no ID was found in a restricted military area. Nobody has any idea who she is or how she died. Send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> identified the body as "Mist," an infamous double-agent. The prolonged stress of playing both the Republic and Imperial sides resulted in a fatal heart attack on her last mission.
History of Espionage
Authorities identified and arrested a retired spy. In his home they found coded reports detailing every mission of his long career. Send your companion to help break the code.
With <<1>>'s help, the spy's notes were decoded, exposing several still-active undercover agents. Authorities quickly rounded them up for interrogation.
Stolen Statue
A priceless work of Khommite art on loan to a museum on Delaya was stolen. The museum wants someone to discreetly recover the piece before word gets out of the theft.
<<1>> recovered the stolen statue from a Hutt collector, and even obtained the name of the museum employee who helped illegally acquire the piece.
Search the Wreckage
A Cygnus Spaceworks prototype of their new luxury personnel shuttle crashed on the swamp-covered world of Dagobah during a test run. Send someone to investigate the crash site.
<<1>> found the shuttle and determined the crash was caused by a faulty auto-nav system. Cygnus Spaceworks offered a substantial sum for the return of the system, and for <<1>>'s silence.
Key to Nowhere
This item has a series of numbers etched on its surface. To understand the significance, someone will have to track the item back to its place of origin.
<<1>> learned that the item was once owned by Sherris, an infamous Chiss smuggler. The numbers were coordinates to a small cache of goods from Sherris's final heist.
High-profile Case
A prominent member of the Tion nobility is accused of murdering his own brother. Tion authorities have asked for an outside investigator to review the case to eliminate accusations of bias.
<<1>> discovered the noble had been framed by his sister, the actual murderer who hoped to remove both of her sibling rivals with one fell swoop.
Smuggler's Luck

The Star Jammers, a small group of independent smugglers, have been successfully raiding ships and avoiding capture across multiple sectors for decades. Send your companion to investigate their methods.
<<1>> learned that the Star Jammers had discovered several new hyperspace routes, allowing them to strike in unexpected locations and escape local authorities.
Video Proof
You've discovered a scrambled holodisc; whatever is on it is important enough for somebody to want to keep it secret. Have one of your companions take a closer look.
<<1>> unscrambled the holodisc to discover footage of a Merr-Sonn Munitions field test of a prototype blaster cannon. Obviously, key military leaders were quite interested in the results.
Bith Secrets
This item bears unusual markings and patterns that appear to be of Bith origin. Send your companion to the Bith homeworld of Clak'dor Seven to investigate.
On Clak'dor Seven, <<1>> learned the strange markings were an obscure musical notation. The item was inscribed with an original song by the famous Bith artist Melmo Ythany.
Digital Warning
A planetary governor received a holovid of a masked individual issuing violent threats. Send your companion to look for clues to identify the perpetrator.
<<1>> analyzed the holovid and determined it was broadcast from the Senator's own office. The clue led to the arrest of the Senator's bitter aide, who confessed everything.
Stirring Up the Masses
Violent demonstrations recently sprang up on planets in four different systems. Send your companion to see if there is any connection.
<<1>> discovered a group called the "Galactic Liberation Front" had coordinated the anti-Republic demonstrations. <<1>> compiled a list of the GLF leaders, who were all taken into custody.
Dead Silence
A secret listening post on Nal Yeshu has gone dark. Send your companion to find out what happened.
<<1>> found the listening post a smoking ruin. Evidence indicates the Republic hired local pirates to launch the attack.
Dangerous Shortcut
Underworld rumors suggest a new--and dangerous--hyperspace route has been discovered to Ord Radama. Have your companion determine the truth.

<<1>> stowed away aboard a pirate vessel and discovered that the new hyperspace route to Sacorria is real--but gravimetrically unstable. There's treasure to be found in the derelict ships along the way.
Land Grab
Czerka Corporation has been using shell companies to buy up land rights on the uninhabited planet of Frenos Three. Send your companion to find out why.
<<1>>'s investigation revealed massive deposits of lommite on Frenos Three. <<1>> also learned that Czerka had paid off key Republic officials to keep news of the find under wraps.
Buying Votes
An investigation exposed several politicians on Ord Mirit who accepted anonymous "campaign donations" in exchange for votes. Send your companion to find out who is behind the bribes.
<<1>> learned that Beht Wardo, a local crimelord, was behind the bribery scandal on Ord Mirit. <<1>> also exposed several more politicians who were involved.
Gaining a Foothold
Rumors suggest the Exchange is establishing connections with criminal gangs on Dromund Fels. Send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> convinced two of the largest criminal organizations on Dromund Fels to work together to thwart the Exchange's effort to establish a presence in Imperial territory.
Secrets of the Ice Caves
Ghe'ssa Tra'biss, the renowned Chiss explorer, is sending an expedition into the ice caverns deep beneath Csilla's frozen surface. Send your companion to join her.
The expedition into the depths of Csilla uncovered several long-forgotten underground settlements. <<1>> returned with fascinating data, interesting stories and a small cache of lost technology.
Strategic Leak
An unknown informant has been publishing strategic secrets publicly. Have your companion determine the informant's identity.
<<1>> spotted the Imperial agent tucking a data crystal underneath a chair at a small diner. <<1>> retrieved the crystal, and authorities arrested the agent and her contact.
Major Malfunction
Recent shipments of blasters manufactured by Merr-Sonn Munitions have all been defective. Send your companion to investigate the corporation.
<<1>> discovered a disgruntled employee at the Merr-Sonn manufacturing plant. The employee admitted to sabotaging the blasters in exchange for payoffs from a corporate rival.
Anybody Out There?
A cryptic signal is being transmitted from an unknown beacon in deep space. Send your companion to find out what it is.
<<1>> found the remains of a millennia-old starship and recovered the still-preserved logs from its databanks.
Domestic Dysfunction
The R1-M8 service droid model has seen several units malfunction and assault their owners. Have your companion discover the cause.
<<1>> traced the malfunction back to a rookie slicer trying to sabotage the droid manufacturer. The company provided a reward for his arrest.
Gone Cold
A flourishing colony in the Esstran Sector has completely dropped out of contact. Send your companion to investigate.
A new type of spice had gripped the entire colony, and <<1>> made sure to shut down the supply.
Abuse of Power
The military is investigating one of its high-ranking officers for suspected ties to the Exchange. Send your companion to gather evidence.
<<1>> discovered the officer was making a small fortune selling arms to the Exchange, and gave the military all the evidence it needed to arrest him.
Behind Closed Doors
A planetary governor in the Bseto system has shut all doors to the public and refuses to speak to anyone. Send your companion to find out why.
Infiltrating the governor's palace, <<1>> found that the governor is battling a severe illness but doesn't want to abdicate power. This information should prove valuable to several parties.
Machine Dreams
Residents of Taanab have found a strange prophet---a droid they claim can foretell the future. Have your companion learn the truth.
The "prophetic" droid was a military project programmed to determine probable enemy strategies. <<1>> returned the droid to the military for a reward.
Project Canceled
Every member of a corporate research team on Qexis has died under mysterious circumstances. Have your companion find the reason.
<<1>> learned that the researchers were forced to use wildly unethical methods in their experiments. When they threatened to talk, their investors made sure to silence them permanently.
Shipyard Strike
A mysterious explosion at a shipyard in the Kuat system has authorities confounded. Send your companion to find the culprit.
<<1>> discovered the explosion was made by an incendiary device planted by an undercover corporate spy. Shipyard security was grateful for the assist.
Disturbing Signs
The superstitious Feeorin people of Odryn have been disturbed by troubling omens, causing much fear and panic. Send your companion to examine the signs.
The strange happenings on Odryn were caused by enemy operatives trying to influence the superstitious Feeorin. <<1>> revealed this information, causing the plan to backfire.
Exposed Positions
Military intelligence reports that secrets are being leaked to the enemy on war-torn Corellia. Have your companion uncover the source.
<<1>> found an officer trading secrets to the enemy in exchange for protection, and was paid well for plugging the leak.
Recorded in Stone
The tablet you found is etched with strange glyphs and symbols. Have your companion decipher the language and find its meaning.
The language is an ancient dialect of the Duros, and <<1>> determined the tablet recorded events that occurred during the time of the Infinite Empire.
Immediate Distress
You found a holorecording of a woman begging for help over the sound of blaster fire. Send your companion to the given coordinates.
<<1>> found a village that had been raided by a rogue Mandalorian clan. After helping the survivors, the planetary government promised to commit resources to defend against the new threat.
Tracking a Shadow
An Etti official was assassinated at midday in a crowded plaza, but nobody can identify the killer. Have your companion piece together the clues.
<<1>> followed the trail of evidence and found the assassin to be a rogue agent of the Empire. The Diplomatic Service was grateful for his apprehension.
Bomb Squadron
Mercenary Captain Marstro suspects that damage to his fighter squadron was due to sabotage. Send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> located the saboteurs and discovered they were members of an Imperial dissident network. The data you uncovered should enable the Empire to track down the remaining members.
Crack the Code
A high-ranking officer has received cryptic messages from an anonymous source. Send your companion to help make sense of the situation.
<<1>> deciphered the message and found it was from an Imperial sympathizer warning the fleet of an imminent Republic ambush. The fleet was able to change course just in time.
Misappropriation
There are whispers that the planet Adinai's defense forces are ill-equipped despite generous funding. Send your companion to track where the credits are going.
