<<1>> found that Lord Ullisric was using his funds to build palaces and statues for himself, which his superiors were displeased to hear.
More Than an Accident
An admiral has learned that her child was murdered during basic training. She's given your companion permission to find the perpetrator at any cost.
<<1>> traced the murder to a Sith acolyte of no particular interest, but discovered the killing was part of a more intricate political plot against the victim's mother.
Bearer of Darkness
Police on Duros have custody of a man they claim is the infamous Butcher of Bannakon, but who claims he's a humble hunter and completely innocent. Your companion can uncover the truth.
<<1>> discovered the man's claim was true--the darkness around him was the product of manipulations by the Sith. The Jedi have released him.
Corporate Meddling
CEO Aphiram Clay vigorously defends the practices of Novinyet Biochemical Corporation, despite mounting evidence of shady dealings. Have your companion expose the truth.
<<1>> found that the Senator received a number of bribes from the company and gathered enough evidence to force him to step down.
Bad for Business
Unknown forces are manipulating galactic markets to benefit a select cadre of corporations. Send your companion to find the responsible party.
Greedy merchants with ties to criminal organizations were working to drive up prices and increase black market influence. <<1>> exposed their plans to Coruscant Security.
Reverse Engineering
A mysterious device was found by the security captain on Onasi Station, near Telos. Have your companion discover what it does and who left it.
<<1>> identified the object as a black market listening device, suggesting an imminent attack on the station. The captain has increased security in anticipation.
Restoring Order
Brentaal security is on the verge of a huge bust against local gangs. Send your companion to provide additional assistance.
<<1>> gathered enough evidence on the gangs that they foolishly decided to strike first. The prepared security forces took care of them handily.
Uncomfortable Silence
Criminal activity on an allied colony has gone completely quiet. Send your companion to find out if this is a stroke of luck or something sinister.
<<1>> discovered the real reason for the lull in criminal activity--gangs amplified their secrecy after starting to deal in new types of spice.
Tactical Analysis
A combat droid with advanced learning algorithms has been on the front lines of conflicts for years. Send your companion to study the data it has gathered.
<<1>> recovered battle data from dozens of major conflicts across many sectors of the galaxy. It should provide the military with exceptional new tactical knowledge.
Economic Recovery
One of the Salzulm banking clan's vaults has been completely emptied. Have your companion find out who did it and how.
<<1>> traced the evidence and exposed that the heist was an inside job by one of the banking clan's own.
Dragon Jewel
A second-rate hunter on Tatooine has been trying to offload a krayt dragon pearl, but other hunters can't believe he could kill a krayt. Send your companion to investigate.
<<1>> revealed the so-called krayt dragon pearl to be a high-quality fake, shaming the seller as a hunter but highlighting his exceptional counterfeiting skills.
The Silent Type
A captured terrorist is being held in a prison station, refusing to talk. Maybe your companion can convince him to say who he's working for.
<<1>> took the empathetic route when talking to the prisoner, prompting him to reveal his employer in a moment of weakness.
Nonstandard Behavior Routines
On the planet Metellos, people are reporting their droids are wandering off for hours at a time--but always return, refusing to discuss their absence. Have your companion investigate.
<<1>> followed one of the droids, where it seemed to hold a secret meeting with other droids from around the city. What they were meeting about remains a mystery.
Losing a Legend
Superstitious spacers tell tales of a "monster" that drifts near the Austan Asteroid Cluster and swallows ships whole. Have your companion dispel the myth.
<<1>> found the myth had some basis in truth, as one large asteroid is skull-shaped and made of a material that plays havoc with onboard navigation.
Laying Low
A pair of hired killers is hiding out on a backwater planet after shooting a common trader. Send your companion to track the killers down.
<<1>> managed to track the fugitives to their swamp shack in the far reaches of the planet. The surprised killers were captured with little resistance.
Specter in Space
The legendary Ghost Ship of Veragi has haunted Outer Rim trade lanes for decades. Send your companion to investigate the mysterious vessel.
<<1>> boarded the ship, finding no ghosts but stumbling on the source of the legend--a malfunctioning prototype cloaking device, causing the ship to flicker in and out of sight.
Disease Control
Several city blocks on Celanon have been quarantined due to a rakghoul virus outbreak. Have your companion investigate how the disease appeared there.
<<1>> found that a sample of the rakghoul virus was carried to Celanon by an unscrupulous trader. The disease has been contained and the trader arrested.
A Warrior's Weapon
You found the hilt of a vibroknife bearing faded Mandalorian markings. Have your companion analyze the hilt to find out where it came from.
The broken hilt was discarded evidence proving a Mandalorian in custody had murdered a citizen. <<1>> handed it over to the authorities.
Plot a Course
You found an old astrogation chart that identifies a hyperspace route no one has ever heard of. Send your companion to the listed coordinates.
<<1>> discovered the unknown hyperspace route did exist as written on the chart, though it may take some time to explore enough for common use.
Internal Affairs
Newly discovered data indicates that a military officer may be a double agent. The military wants your companion to set up a meeting with the officer and determine the truth.
<<1>> gained the confidence of the officer so thoroughly that he spilled all the details of his work undermining the Empire.
Employment History
A merchant running a supply route to the Outer Rim is suspected of being a former arms smuggler. Have your companion look into his background.
<<1>> discovered that the merchant was not only a smuggler, but had high-level access to Republic officials during the war. The Empire would certainly like to have a talk with him.
Never Trust a Hutt
Delegates from the Hutt Cartel have set up a secret meeting to discuss business with several top smuggling rings. Send your companion to learn the delegates' secrets.
<<1>> brought every Hutt lie and diversion to light, forcing the delegates to deal much more honestly than they'd planned.
Vendetta
Members of the wealthy and influential Rothkar family have been turning up dead, murdered one by one. Send your companion to find the killer.
<<1>> found the killer was the family's escaped Nikto slave, who was taking his revenge after his harsh mistreatment.
Situational Awareness
A paranoid diplomat needs reassurance that an upcoming conference is not an elaborately staged ambush. Have your companion gather the necessary proof.
<<1>> observed the lords setting up the meeting and discovered that their intention was hardly diplomatic. Darth Nephantes was thankful for the warning.
Blank Slate
A man was found wandering the Massassi ruins of Yavin 4 with no memory or awareness of his surroundings. Send your companion to question him.
<<1>> discovered the man had been experimented on in an Imperial laboratory. The Jedi will work with him further to recover his memories about the experience.
Transportation Troubles
A major shipping company based out of Alsakan has suddenly stopped its services and closed up for good. Send your companion to find the reason.
<<1>> learned that the company was actually a front for a major smuggling organization, and closed up shop to prevent being exposed.
Missing Asset
A skilled agent was supposed to have checked in from Kashyyyk, but the appointed time has come and gone. Send a companion to discover what happened.
The SIS agent had gone silent to avoid pursuers, but <<1>>'s arrival chased them off his trail.
Deep Diving
A Chagrian exploration team has disappeared while studying the lost sunken cities of the Chagrian homeworld. Send your companion to determine the team's fate.
<<1>> found that the explorers had been attacked by a Mon Calamari smuggling ring based in the ruins of the sunken city. The gangsters have now been dealt with.
Political Restoration
Several priceless items were stolen from the capital of Averill. Send your companion to track down the objects and return them.
<<1>> traced the thefts to a political dissident hiding in the slums, who wanted to damage the Republic for giving in and signing the Treaty of Coruscant.
Uncharted Means Unclaimed
Sensors have discovered new and unexplored ancient ruins on the moon Dxun. To beat other treasure seekers to it, send a companion to claim its fortune.
<<1>> discovered a hidden burial chamber within the ruins on Dxun and plundered a fortune's worth of ancient artifacts!
Time to Get Wet
Sunken ruins have been discovered on Manaan. A companion might want to dive for buried treasure.
<<1>> braved depths on Manaan other divers dared not dive and found a pirate's long-lost treasure room!
Stalker Needed
An Alderaanian noble is following clues that supposedly lead to an ancient treasure trove. Send a companion to shadow the noble's team then beat them to the score.
<<1>> followed the Alderaanian noble on his treasure hunt and deftly pilfered the finest piece from the find!
Dig It
An excavation is underway on the Outer Rim planet Malachor Five. A companion should join it and see what's uncovered.
<<1>> assumed a leadership role in the excavation on Malachor Five, uncovering a lower ring of chambers, and was awarded the pick of the find!
Sealed in Stupidity
You received a holotransmission from a Rodian thief who broke into a high-security casino vault on Talravin, then accidentally locked himself inside. He'll share the wealth if rescued.
<<1>> broke the bungling Rodian thief out of the casino vault then forced him to relinquish the most valuable of its contents!
It's Raining Treasure

A Trandoshan pirate ship was shot down attempting to flee the atmosphere of Abregado-rae, scattering its pilfered wealth across the southern hemisphere of the planet. Send a companion to hunt for treasure.
<<1>> outwitted and outhunted a Trandoshan salvage effort and scrounged most of the wealth from their destroyed pirate ship!
I Do
An elderly aristocrat on Aquella has offered a dowry of rare items to whoever marries his cousin. Your companion could steal the treasure as soon as it's presented.
<<1>> infiltrated the wedding party and seized the dowry. The marriage went ahead, but the treasure is now yours.
One Man's Treasure...
An eccentric wildlife collector is offering a centuries-old ornamental trinket in exchange for gelagrub larva. Send a companion to Felucia to acquire some and collect the reward.
Learning that gelagrub larva need to constantly eat to survive, <<1>> secured enough food for the journey and earned the ornamental trinket from the eccentric wildlife collector!
Slave Savings
An escaped slave on Endovan is the only man who knows where his dead master concealed his wealth. Have your companion investigate.
<<1>> hunted down the escaped slave on Dromund Kaas, convinced him to reveal the location of his master's valuables and returned with the Sith Lord's wealth!
Fallen Jedi
To protect the order, the Jedi Bruhn--who was succumbing to the dark side--imprisoned himself and died on a fringe planet. Have your companion seek his tomb.
<<1>> found the body of the Jedi who sacrificed himself for the order and returned it to Tython--but his belongings are now yours.
Hunt the Hunter
A consortium of big game hunters is seeking volunteers to be hunted in the Vendaxan jungle. Survivors will be awarded great prizes. Maybe you should "volunteer" a companion.
<<1>> survived being hunted on Vendaxa, collected the reward, then volunteered again and trumped the hunters for a second prize!
Preying on the Meek
An unscrupulous con man has bilked dozens of elderly Dantooine citizens of their personal heirlooms. A companion should track him down and return the belongings.
<<1>> captured the con man preying on the elderly of Dantooine and was rewarded handsomely for returning all of their belongings!
Shuffle Up and Deal
A massive pazaak tournament is being held on Zeltros, boasting a rare and valuable prize pool. One of your companions can enter the tournament.
<<1>> took the grand prize in the pazaak tournament on Zeltros!
Map or Trap?
A complicated map outlining a path to a supposed cache of buried wealth was mistakenly transmitted to you. A companion could follow the clues to see if it's real.
<<1>> deciphered the true destination on the map and made an incredible haul!
Asteroid Vault
Sensors register something man-made and metallic just beneath the surface of an asteroid traveling from the far reaches of the galaxy. A companion should investigate.
<<1>> discovered that the asteroid housed an ancient vault. She liberated all of its contents before it collided with another asteroid!
Stare into the Sun
Every seventy-six years, a solar eclipse occurs on the planet Pakuuni, fabled to reveal the hidden tomb of the first settler. A companion could search and bring home its treasures.
<<1>> witnessed the solar eclipse on Pakuuni and discovered the tomb of the first settler, returning with several valuable trinkets.
Riddled by Riddles
An eccentric hermit on Kashyyyk has come out of hiding and is rewarding those who can answer his ancient riddles. Send a companion to give it a try.
The hermit returned to hiding in shame after <<1>> successfully answered all his riddles and earned all his prizes!
Behind the Water Curtain
You overheard a story about a golden waterfall on Skustell that hides a cave of precious wonders. A companion should search for this cave.
<<1>> found the Skustell waterfall cave and evicted its winged dwellers to take all there was to offer!
Getting in on the Art Trade
The Museum of Antiquities on Alderaan is set to receive a shipment of rare art. Send a companion to intercept the shipment.
<<1>> intercepted the shipment of rare and valuable art, cleaning out the shipping containers and replacing them with worthless copies of paintings by the famous commercial artist Ornas Lodin.
Pugilism
Is one of your companions bold enough to enter the gladiatorial tournament on Ylesia? The last combatant standing gets a valuable surprise.
<<1>> was crowned champion of the gladiatorial tournament on Ylesia and won a spectacular prize!
Going Once...
An auction house on Abregado-rae has misidentified some of its pieces, estimating values far too low. A shrewd companion could join the bidding and bring home a steal.
<<1>> convinced others not to bid on the misappraised auction items and won them for only twenty-five percent of their actual value!
Burial Rights
Rumors tell of an ancient civilization's graveyard on Onderon that in fact houses treasures instead of the dead. A companion will be your sleuth.
<<1>> was able to recover a small collection of valuable relics from the graves on Onderon!
Spelunking
A new cave system, said to be a trove of natural treasures, has been discovered on Aeten Two. Send a companion to investigate.
<<1>> hit the mother lode of valuable resources in the cave system on Aeten Two!
Unclaimed Inheritance
A gang kingpin has died with no heirs, and the underworld is conducting a hunt to claim his secret vault. Send a companion to try to win the hunt.
<<1>> took the grand prize in the hunt for the dead kingpin's treasure vault!
Stolen Trophy
You acquired a communique reporting the theft of a Hutt's most prized possessions. The getaway ship has crashed on the planet Orto--send a companion to retrieve the bounty.
<<1>> claimed the Hutt's stolen possessions for you and was also able to bring the thief to the Hutt for a bounty of credits!
Retrieve This
You obtained a recording of a distress call suggesting that a ship carrying stolen goods crashed on Saleucami. Send a companion to see what can be recovered.
<<1>> was able to beat back scavengers and pirates and secure the bulk of the stolen goods!
The Root of Rivalry
A disgruntled noblewoman wants a rival ruined. She'll give you the coordinates of her rival's secret treasure vaults, if your companion cleans them out.
<<1>> found the most precious item in the rival's treasure vault: his financial records. The Kaas noblewoman was thrilled and gave <<1>> a bonus.
Underground City
A tectonic rift on Mirial has uncovered an old underground city rife with untold wealth. A companion could see what can be salvaged.
While investigating the lost city on Mirial, <<1>> uncovered a secret cache of alien relics!
The Slaves' Treasure
Buried valuables have been found on Dromund Fels--the takings of rebellious slaves. Send your companion to see what else they hid.
Working out from the original site, <<1>> found a valuable Sith stone carving camouflaged by vines.
False Force User
A Jedi impersonator intercepted a donation meant for the archives on Tython. Perhaps your companion could pull off the same scam?
Working fast and tirelessly, <<1>> caught up with the Jedi impersonator before he could sell any of the stolen treasures!
Runaway Ship
Just as a ship in your sector jumped to lightspeed, an alert named it as transporting stolen Jar'Kai relics. Have a companion try to track it down.
<<1>> computed the runaway ship's destination, followed, infiltrated and sabotaged it until Imperial Command could send troops, earning a generous reward.
Senatorial Search
A Senator from Belnar has gone missing along with a sacred heirloom belonging to the native Khil. Dispatch a companion to the planet to search and rescue.
<<1>> found the lost Senator from Belnar and tricked him into confessing that he had the ancient Khil artifact. The Khils were extremely grateful.
Snow-covered Antiques
You received a distress call from a group of antique collectors buried under an avalanche somewhere on Ando Prime. A companion will be rewarded for rescuing them.
<<1>> was able to pinpoint the location of the avalanche-trapped antique collectors on Ando Prime--the reward was far beyond expectations!
Climbing High
A prize has been offered to whoever can climb to the top of the highest mountain on Fest the fastest. Enter a companion in the competition.
<<1>> broke the speed record for ascending the highest mountain on Fest and took home the grand prize!
A Grain of Sand
A scientist is bellyaching that he dropped an incredibly valuable anode no bigger than a grain of sand somewhere in the Vactooine desert. A companion with great eyesight might find it.
<<1>> tenaciously scoured the Vactooine desert and brought back a bad sunburn and the tiny valuable lost anode!
Somebody Stole My Stuff
A collector of antiquities in House Panteer on Alderaan discovered that several of his pieces have been replaced with fakes. A companion can claim a reward for finding the originals.
<<1>> became a supersleuth, tracking down all of the collector's stolen antiquities, and returned with an amazing reward!
Prepare to be Boarded
The famous Kessel Raiders are planning a heist on a rich Hutt's yacht. If your companion helps the Raiders out, you'll be entitled to a cut....
<<1>> distracted the Hutt's guards at a crucial moment. The Kessel Raiders got out with a fortune, and they're willing to share.
I was Somebody Once
A drunk in a Klatooine cantina is selling an old tracking device, claiming it leads to fabulous wealth. For a few credits, your companion could find out.
<<1>> followed a mysterious signal with the tracking device. It led to Klatooine's south pole, and a derelict starship filled with valuables!
Go Forth
An underground complex, once belonging to the mysterious crimelord Goto, has been found on Onderon. It's guarded by traps, but surely your companion could get inside?
Bypassing the traps, <<1>> managed to reach the complex's control room. It contained dozens of inactive droids--strange, but still a valuable haul.
Hunting is for the Birds
An ornithologist on Ruusan is paying handsomely for rare yellow-spotted gibbit bird feathers. Does a companion want to go bird hunting?
When realizing that gibbit birds are found in the mouths of rancors, <<1>> hired mercs and went on a rancor hunt, delivering a large quantity of spotted yellow feathers to the ornithologist.
Distressed Space Station
An independent space station that orbits and warehouses mined resources from the planet Serapin radioed distress then went silent. Send a companion to investigate.
<<1>> stopped a siege of the space station by Exchange gangsters and was allowed to choose a reward from their rich storerooms!
Smuggler Summons
A smuggler has offered a sixty-forty split to anyone willing to help him through a trapped ancient vault on the planet Vo. Can you spare a companion?
<<1>> protected the treasure-seeking smuggler then renegotiated a greater cut of the bounty!
He's Gone Rogue
A rogue Republic trooper has absconded with a speeder full of precious metals plundered from war zones. Send your companion to find and reclaim his treasure.
<<1>> confronted the rogue Republic trooper and secured his speeder full of precious metals! You could always send it back to the military, but....
X Marks the Spot
An ancient alien signal from deep space has been deciphered--it appears to be a beacon marking the location of the species' hidden wealth. Send a companion to investigate.
<<1>> found the source of the alien signal and uncovered a secret compartment in the safe house that still housed ancient treasures!
Break Up the Deal
You intercepted an encoded message between mercenaries coordinating the sale of artifacts looted during the war. A companion could stop the deal.
<<1>> tracked the mercenaries to their starship and retrieved the stolen plunder before the deal could be finalized. The mercenaries are going to have some very unhappy customers.
Riches of an Ancient Empire

An archaeologist's journal reveals the discovery of a new ruin of the Azure Imperium on Anaxes, containing treasures of the ancient Empire. Send your companion to explore the ruin before the excavation team arrives.
<<1>> located the ruin and found ancient treasures of the Azure Imperium before the excavation team could arrive.
A Pirate's Legacy

You've found the astrogation charts of the notorious pirate, Jon Arco, whose ship disappeared somewhere in the Outer Rim. Have your companion use the charts to pinpoint his ship and recover his riches.
<<1>> pinpointed Jon Arco's derelict vessel and recovered his plunder.
A Colonel's Dreams
Colonel Larcet fancies herself an antiquities collector. She's obtained the location of an alien hoard from a "trustworthy source," but needs your companion to finish the job.
<<1>> followed the Moff's instructions and--despite the betrayal of his alien source--found the promised hoard!
Filthy Thief
A thief imprisoned for thirty years has confessed that he hid his stolen goods somewhere in Anoat's sewer system. A companion can join the search through the muck.
<<1>> trudged through kilometers of sewer muck and found the thief's hidden score! Now that it's been hosed down, it's worth quite a lot.
Floating for Years
Markings identify a ship adrift in deep space as a long-lost Imperial freighter said to carry treasures confiscated during the Sacking of Coruscant. Send a companion to verify.
<<1>> found the adrift Imperial starship undisturbed, and found the legends were true--its holds were full of cargo pillaged from the Jedi Temple and the Senate tower!
The Tionese Burial Ship
Legend tells of a Tionese king "buried" on a starship, left adrift in the Omman system. You've painstakingly calculated its possible location; send your companion to find it.
<<1>> followed your calculations and found the burial ship! The treasures of the Tionese king are all yours.
Construction Site
While tearing down an old consulate building on Jandoon, crews found a secret annex laden with traps and other security. Send a companion to see what's inside.
After successfully bypassing the traps in the secret annex of the old Republic Consulate, <<1>> followed a hunch and made a spectacular find!
Asleep Twenty Years
A war hero has come out of twenty-year coma incessantly talking about a secret shrine on the planet Vo that houses great treasures. Just in case he's sane, send a companion.
<<1>> reports that the Vo shrine had been discovered and emptied long ago, but careful inspection uncovered a special chamber filled with amazing valuables!
You Can't Take it with You
Rumor has it a recently deceased Ralltiirian banking mogul had his most valuable possessions jettisoned into space with his body. A companion could liberate them.
<<1>> found the jettisoned coffin of the Ralltiirian banker and brought home all the hidden valuables!
Lucky Number Czerka
A corrupt Czerka administrator got lucky in the casinos of Nar Shaddaa then disappeared. Every lowlife is searching for him and his winnings. Maybe a companion could find him first.
<<1>> outsmarted all other searchers and found the missing Czerka administrator, who gladly gave up half his winnings to be transported to safety.
Ancient City
Foragers have discovered a crude tunnel burrowing under Carida's largest mountain range, believed to be the entrance to a fabled ancient city. A companion should check it out.
<<1>> followed the maze of tunnels under Carida's mountain range and discovered the lost city, full of amazing artifacts and ancient relics!
Rancor Lair
Explorers found an uncharted lair on Dathomir, with a mutant rancor guarding its stockpile of "trophies." There's bound to be valuable items--a companion could find out.
<<1>> slew the mutant rancor on Dathomir and painstakingly picked out all the best and most valuable items in its lair!
Follow the Droid
Before dying, a smuggler programmed the coordinates of his amassed wealth into a droid that's now missing on Althir. If a companion finds the droid, you get rich.
<<1>> found the runaway droid on Althir, followed the coordinates in its memory and found the smuggler's amassed wealth!
Bank Error
A daring group of thieves is planning a heist on a Banking Clan vault, but they need one more skilled member to pull the job.
The heist went perfectly according to plan, the divvying of the loot did not, but <<1>> was the last one standing after the smoke cleared.
Bug Guts
The annual lylek hunt on Ryloth is underway. This year, a unique item is implanted in the stomach of one of the beasts. A companion could try to slay the right one.
<<1>> dominated the lylek hunt on Ryloth and slew the beast with the unique prize in its stomach.
Smuggler's Dig
A black market merchant has sent an invitation to help him track down lost relics from a recent dig on Dubrillion. Can you spare a companion?
<<1>> saved the smuggler's life during the excavation on Dubrillion and was rewarded with special items from the discovery!
Medals of Dishonor
A war hero has died. His body was shamelessly looted, and the scavengers took his valuable and meaningful war medals. A companion should mercilessly hunt for them.
<<1>> mercilessly hunted down every last scavenger and collected all of the dead war hero's valuable medals!
Repo Man
A seedy, wannabe bounty hunter named Yreel has missed payments on the high-tech equipment he purchased from an underworld kingpin. A companion can play repo man.
<<1>> repossessed the unpaid equipment from Yreel and delivered it and the delinquent bounty hunter to the underworld kingpin for an even richer reward!
The Unnamed House
There are stories of a forgotten noble estate in the Setolian mountains, its treasure rooms intact. Have a companion see if there's any truth to this.
After a trek through the mountains, <<1>> found the estate mostly buried by a landslide. <<1>> managed to get into the estate's strongroom and recovered the forgotten nobles' wealth.
And They're Off!
The runner-up in an intragalactic podracing event has absconded with the championship trophy and prizes. Send a companion to catch up with him.
After struggling against several competing treasure hunters, <<1>> laid a brilliant trap and caught the thieving podracer, collecting all of the stolen prizes!
Bank Robbers
You found a holorecording offering a reward for the thieves who broke open a bank vault on Muunilinst. Have your companion track down the thieves and claim the reward.
<<1>> tracked down the thieves and was able to bring them in alive for the best reward.
Secret Games
You found a marked sabacc token for entering an exclusive sabacc game on Nar Shaddaa. Send your companion to enter and win the pot.
<<1>> entered the sabacc tournament and won, getting invited to the next tournament in the process.
The Prince-Regent's Treasure
You found an heirloom belonging to the Tapani prince-regent. Word on the HoloNet is that other heirlooms were stolen. Have your companion recover the heirlooms and claim the prince-regent's reward.
<<1>> recovered all the heirlooms and negotiated a hefty reward from the prince-regent.
Among Thieves
A terrified thief wants to return the goods he's stolen from the Hutt Cartel but needs help recovering them from his partner in crime. Your companion could help.
<<1>> overcame the repentant thief's partner guarding the stolen goods and claimed the whole haul.
Reclaim History
The Hutt Cartel has possession of many ancient heirlooms of the Evocii people. Send your companion to acquire the most culturally significant pieces.
<<1>> used a brilliant diversion to distract Hutt security guarding the Evocii heirlooms, buying time to find all the most significant pieces!
Sacred Relics
A con artist made off with the sacred idols of the Chevin people. If a companion could retrieve them, a reward is offered.
<<1>> quickly tracked down the con artist and was able to return all of the stolen relics to the Chevin--for a healthy reward.
The Warrior's Spear
The great Mandalorian warrior Thraijon is dead, and his ancient hunter's trophies have already been stolen. Send your companion to find the looters.
<<1>> tracked down the individuals who stole the dead Mandalorian's relics. The ancient Mandalorian hunting trophies are reunited--in your possession.
Indigestion
Raiders on Tatooine have thrown a lockbox containing valuable relics into a sarlacc pit. Maybe one of your companions has the guts to go get it.
It wasn't pretty, but <<1>> ventured into the Sarlacc pit and found the lockbox filled with Republic relics!
Inheritance
A cargo hauler transporting the wealth of a deceased Senator was forced to jettison its cargo during a chase. Send a companion to find the goods.
<<1>> tenaciously rounded up the Senator's belongings that had been jettisoned into space.
Mutual Destruction
Two rival pirate vessels, the Scorching Pulsar and the Dreaded Shyrack, destroyed each other in a shootout. Have your companion loot their treasure-laden hulls.
The pirate ships must have both been returning from raids, as <<1>> found many treasures in their holds.
Sealed No More
An orbital bombardment on Rabaan exposed an underground vault crawling with hostile droids. Your companion could slip past them and recover any valuables inside.
<<1>> entered the vault unseen by the droids and the automated security, pilfering a number of valuables before escaping.
Remembering the First
House Pelagia has a standing bounty for family relics recovered from their first colony. Have your companion search Pelagon for any lost heirlooms.
<<1>> recovered the Pelagian Band, a ring worn by the first leaders of House Pelagia. The family was more than happy to pay for its return.
The Latest Thing
Rill scales are a hot fashion item throughout the Tapani Sector. Nobles and merchants are paying big credits for them; send your companion hunting.
<<1>> took the scales from a large male rill--particularly large and colorful samples. The fashion-conscious eagerly shelled out credits for them.
Re-Stolen Goods
A Weequay smuggler betrayed his crew after a heist and escaped into the Arkanis Sector. Have your companion track him down and steal his score.
<<1>> followed the smuggler to a remote moon, relieving him of his ill-gotten treasure the moment he let his guard down.
Wilderness Expedition
There are rumors of forgotten treasures buried deep in the jungles of Caamas. Send your companion to determine if the rumors are fact or fiction.
<<1>> discovered a number of exotic idols within a ruin, which should sell for a tidy sum to interested collectors.
Waste Not, Want Not
A luxury ship belonging to House Melantha was nearly destroyed by an explosion during an assassination attempt. Have your companion search the derelict ship for valuables.
While collecting treasures from the luxury ship, <<1>> stumbled on a sealed room with survivors still inside. Their family was extremely grateful for their rescue.
Crystalline Tunnels
Dantooine has miles of unexplored cave systems rich with natural treasures, including gemstones and minerals. Have your companion brave the depths.
<<1>> entered a never-before-seen section of the caves, locating a cavern rich in minerals and gemstones.
Unpleasant Reminder
Discovery of a Rakata artifact on Duro has upset the locals, whose legends speak hatefully of the ancient species. Your companion could relieve them of the item.
<<1>> arrived just in time to prevent the Duros from destroying the artifact, convincing them to hand it over instead.
Desert Vulture
The great hunter Duhl Maroth ventured into the wastes of Tatooine and hasn't been seen since. Send your companion to recover his many valuable trophies.
<<1>> traced the hunter's path to a krayt dragon cave, which was thankfully empty long enough to retrieve the trophies from the hunter's body.
Technically Not Stealing
The capsule you recovered contains coordinates and a key to an old Exchange cache on Taris. Send your companion to retrieve it.
<<1>> found the cache deep in the Tarisian swamps, loaded with treasures and wealth predating the Sith occupation.
Deep Stone Scar
The aged black box you found shows that a vast canyon on Talravin was actually formed by a crashed starship. Have your companion loot the remains.
Although the starship had been picked at by looters for generations, <<1>> found a deeply buried durasteel case containing highly valued antiquities.
Intolerable
A diplomat has been skimming credits from the "gifts" of worlds he visits. Send your companion to retrieve his stashed wealth.
The Imperial diplomat offered <<1>> the stolen credits and then some, in exchange for not being turned over to his superiors.
Learn from the Best
A blockade runner somehow made it past dozens of security checkpoints with a load of precious cargo. Send your companion to learn their secrets.
The blockade runner almost made it safely to Republic space before <<1>> intercepted his ship and took the cargo.
Cut Them Off
Rebel forces are funding their guerrilla war with artifacts stolen from Florrum. Have your companion intercept one of their shipments.
<<1>> busted the trade between the rebels and their fence, retrieving both the artifacts and the payment.
Ancestral Antiquities
A wealthy investor is obsessed with finding relics belonging to ancient members of his bloodline. Send your companion to aid his search.
<<1>> discovered a tablet referring to the lord's ancestors and establishing his purity back twenty generations. The Sith showed rare generosity in his reward.
Gather the Pieces
You received word of the discovery of a shard of Garu's Warblade, a weapon belonging to an ancient Sith Lord. Have your companion search the Esstran sector for the remaining pieces.
<<1>> recovered enough of the shards to restore the Sith warblade to a recognizable state, and auctioned the completed piece to the highest bidder.
Stalk the Forest Floor
Czerka Corporation dumped tonnes of supplies and technology in the rush to leave Kashyyyk three centuries ago. Have your companion comb the planet surface for what remains.
Among the scatterings of Czerka supplies, <<1>> found a lockbox containing lavish trinkets--likely the former possessions of a Czerka executive.
Heroic Memorabilia
General Oma'gorek only needs the gauntlets of Kaellus Fane to complete the lost Republic hero's full set of armor. Have your companion find the gauntlets.

<<1>> rescued the antique gauntlets from an Imperial scrap yard just before they were about to be incinerated. General Oma'gorek was thrilled to add them to his collection, and traded you an item of his own.
Environmental Danger
A group of renegade smugglers believes a cache of stolen goods will be safe on the hazardous volcano world Raisa. Send your companion to prove the smugglers wrong.
<<1>> discovered a path to the goods that avoided much of the volcanic heat covering the planet, recovering the cache without the smugglers' knowledge.
Bellicose Opulence
A priceless statue commissioned to adorn a new battle cruiser is being transferred to the cruiser's shipyard. Have your companion intercept the transport ship and steal the statue.
<<1>> secretly swapped the crate containing the statue for another crate full of stones when the transport ship stopped to refuel.
Something Beneath the Rubble
Construction crews on Gadon 3 are detecting a strange power signature from an ancient ruin. Send your companion to trace the source.
The power signature came from a prototype siege droid thought lost after the Sacking of Coruscant. <<1>> returned the prototype to the military for a fitting reward.
Moving Up in the World
A powerful chieftain on Zonju Five is seeking his family's lost crown to secure his bid for the planet's throne. Send your companion to find the crown.
<<1>> found the crown hidden by a rival seeking to prevent the chieftain from pursuing the throne. The chieftain gave a substantial reward for its return.
Picking the Bones
The Torve system was once the home of the Bronzium Brigade, a deadly mercenary company. Have your companion search the company's abandoned headquarters for lost treasure.
The Bronzium Brigade mercenaries must have left their base in a hurry, as <<1>> found several stashes of valuables amidst the degraded weapons and broken equipment.
Cartel Conflict
An intra-cartel skirmish caused a Hutt's pleasure barge to plunge to the surface of Nar Shaddaa. Send your companion to search the wreck for any scattered riches.
<<1>> collected the lavish treasures from the crashed ship while thankfully avoiding any sight of the gravity-stricken Hutt himself.
What's Rightfully Theirs
Clan Ordo wishes to recover centuries-old trophies from the city of Iziz on Onderon, but the clan members are barred from entering. Send your companion to retrieve the items.
<<1>> slipped through the streets of Iziz to find the trophies of Clan Ordo. The Mandalorians willingly paid for the relics of their past.
Extravagant Possessions
An eccentric merchant named Waleutto Yobariok was said to be served in his mansion by a gold-plated protocol droid. Have your companion search his abandoned estate for it.
<<1>> found the gold-plated droid locked away safely in an underground storage room, unharmed save for a fine layer of dust.
The Blazing Tomb
A closer look at Ceraxian's Comet reveals it to be the sarcophagus of an ancient prince, given a burial in space. Have your companion loot its treasures.
The prince's comet was the definition of opulence, and <<1>> found many valuable artifacts and trinkets encased in the sarcophagus.
A Very Serious Game
The Tapani noble houses are hosting an athletic tournament, offering valuable luxury items to the winner. Send your companion to compete.
Fending off the nobles' petty accusations of cheating, <<1>> swept the tournament fairly and walked away with the champion's prize.
Too Corrupt for Neimoidians
A casino on Cato Neimoidia was shut down for stealing from investors, but its haul was never found. Have your companion fix that.
<<1>> not only found the casino's stolen goods, but a stash of valuables from its formerly legitimate gambling operations.
Exchange Remnants
An information broker passed on the location of an old Exchange hideout near Telos. Have your companion check the abandoned compound for any forgotten treasures.
<<1>> found remnants of an Exchange crime lord's luxurious lifestyle, taking the finest treasures in sight.
An All-Way Draw
The swoop tournament on Kauron was so rife with corruption that every bike was sabotaged before the race started. Send your companion to steal the prize money.
With the swoop bike gangs distracted by their violent rivalries, <<1>> was able to take the tournament prize without drawing any attention.
Proper Prospecting
The deed you found is a mining claim on a Mid Rim asteroid belt. Supposedly the belt is dry, but send your companion to make sure.
After seeing nothing but dust and worthless rocks in the asteroid belt, <<1>> finally found an asteroid rich with minerals ready to be extracted.
Low Tide Recovery
You found the cargo manifest for a ship that crashed in the waters of Champala. Send your companion into the depths to recover the shipment.
During the low tide, <<1>> dove down to the wreck and recovered a large haul of intact cargo from the derelict.
Sword of the First
An allied Mandalorian clan is searching for the lost dueling blade of its founder. Send your companion to locate it and earn the clan's favor.
<<1>> discovered the blade buried in the skull of a large beast skeleton, which in turn contained the remains of the founder himself. The Mandalorians were ecstatic about the find.
Reclamation
A smuggler carrying valuable relics was shot down in the skies of Arkania. Have your companion find the crash site before anyone else.
Although many of the Sith relics were damaged, <<1>> carefully extracted a number of them unharmed from the wreckage.
Tread Softly
Jettisoned cargo from a fleeing pirate ship landed on the pristine planet Ithor. Have your companion sneak past the watchful Ithorians to retrieve it.
<<1>> landed out of sight of the Ithorians' floating cities and retrieved the dropped cargo without notice.
How Not to Fly
A thief escaping from authorities on the foggy world of Vassek accidentally piloted his ship into a mountainside. Your companion could recover the valuables from the wreck.
<<1>> navigated the foggy planet carefully, finding the smuggler's ship and taking the stolen cargo from the wreck.
Renegade's Aegis
The armor of a legendary Zabrak warrior is said to be hidden somewhere on Iridonia. Send your companion to find it.
<<1>> moved carefully on the Zabrak homeworld, finding the hidden tomb of the Zabrak Sith and recovering the armor within.
Harsh Wilderness
Explorers on Tython supposedly found treasure in the untamed wilds, but never made it back to civilization. Send your companion to discover their fate.
<<1>> found the Tythonian treasure being hoarded by a pack of Flesh Raiders, but recovered it after clearing the pack out.
Toxic Knowledge
Many Jedi artifacts still exist on the irradiated planet Ossus, which was once home to the Jedi Temple. Send your companion to search for valuables.
<<1>> survived Ossus's radiation long enough to collect several holocrons from an enclave on the planet's surface.
Once More Into Darkness
A drunken explorer on Corellia spoke of his disastrous expedition to recover a treasure on Umbara. Send your companion to finish the job.
<<1>> found both the treasure and the remains of the other members of the expedition to Umbara. The lone survivor, at least, can now bury his friends.
Untouched Ruins
A salvager from Hapan sold you the rights to his claim for cheap, citing the ruined castles he explores as too dangerous. Your companion isn't so scared.
Although the ruin was crawling with native creatures and droids, <<1>> found stashes of expensive goods throughout the complex.
A Glimpse of Things Lost
A Voss Mystic has had a vision of an ancient tomb on a remote planet. Send your companion to find any artifacts within.
The planet <<1>> traveled to was barren and dry, but the tomb was at the coordinates given. Inside were the relics of an ancient ruler, likely from before whatever disaster befell the world.
Highest Bidder
An anonymous black market dealer is advertising a cache of advanced weapons for sale. Send your companion to make sure the weapons don't fall into enemy hands.
<<1>> convinced the dealer to sell his weapons to your side. The dealer was impressed enough to throw in a little something extra, too.
Business Opportunity
BlasTech officials are looking for security to protect a key weapons shipment from pirates. Send your companion to ensure delivery.
Thanks to <<1>>, the BlasTech weapons reached their proper destination. Company officials were more than willing to share a cut of the profits.
Stolen Masterpieces
Thieves have plundered the Museum of Abstract Ingenuity. Have your companion deliver the stolen artwork to a private collector on Antar Four.
A sudden rise in the artist's popularity has doubled the value of his art. The collector on Antar Four paid extra when <<1>> delivered the stolen artwork.
Fighters for Sale
The fighting pits on Loovria are always looking for fresh meat. Have your companion check the slave markets for potential gladiators.
<<1>> delivered some Barabel slaves to the fighting pits on Loovria. The arena masters paid handsomely for such fearsome warriors.
Poaching
The endangered snow falcons of Rhinnal are a rare and prized delicacy worth a small fortune to those willing to risk life imprisonment hunting them.
<<1>> found a corrupt conservationist using his falcon preserve to breed and sell live snow falcons and brokered a trade deal.
A Slight Lean
A number of criminal interests are seeking an offworlder to convince the governor of Fait d'Fait to reconsider his strong anti-organized crime platform.
<<1>> discovered some extremely embarrassing information about the governor that will allow the syndicates to manipulate him indefinitely, and they couldn't be more pleased.
Fueling Dissent
A crime lord is shifting the balance of power on Raisa. Send your companion to intervene.
<<1>> ran a Republic blockade to deliver the weapons to the crimelord on Raisa. She was so impressed she offered <<1>> a substantial bonus.
Dangerous Pastimes
The Mandalorians on Geonosis are restless and hungry for sport. Maybe your companion can find something dangerous for them to hunt.
<<1>> delivered a pack of wild vornskyrs to Geonosis. The Mandalorians paid extra for such lethal predators.
Organ Transplant
An influential diplomat has been diagnosed with Quannot's Syndrome and needs some vital organs replaced. Have your companion search for potential donors.
Moff Taigo's operation was such a success that he gave <<1>> a bonus for good work.
Disruptive Behavior
Black Sun is actively grabbing up materials needed to create deadly disruptor rifles. Send your companion to fake a trade and expose Black Sun's dealers.
<<1>> pulls off the transaction flawlessly and now the Exchange can follow the goods to Black Sun's other supporters.
Overthrowing the Tyrants

On the neutral world of Livien, the recent revolution against the planet's tyrannical royal family has led to widespread chaos and supply shortages. Send your companion to deliver a key shipment and win local support.
<<1>> delivered the shipment to Livien, then helped the rebels oust the royal family. In appreciation, the rebels gave <<1>> a substantial bonus.
Shady Deal
A pirate named Ingor Watt plans to sell a shipment of stolen blasters to warlords on the planet Charros 4. Send your companion to make him a better offer.
Ingor Watt delivered the goods, and he even threw in a little something extra for <<1>>'s trouble.
Ungo the Hutt
Ungo the Hutt is looking for security to escort a shipment through the smuggler-infested Kellis system. Send a companion and you will be well rewarded.
<<1>> warded off a pirate attack, keeping Ungo's shipment safe. The grateful Hutt offered a generous reward for <<1>>'s services.
Working for the Kubaz
Obinn, a wealthy crimelord on Kubindi, needs a shipment delivered to an anonymous customer. Perhaps one of your companions can help him out.
<<1>> fought off a rival Kubindi crimelord trying to intercept Obinn's shipment. The grateful Obinn threw in an extra reward as payment.
Mysterious Offer
Gor Jolda, a low-level Nikto gang member, wants to recruit someone outside his organization to make a special delivery. Send your companion to learn the details.
<<1>> helped Gor Jolda secretly arm his followers to depose a local crimelord. The power play worked, and <<1>> was handsomely rewarded.
Enticing Ejro
Ejro the Hutt is looking to move into the arms dealer business. Pick up a weapons shipment from our supplier and deliver them to this potential ally.
<<1>> made quite an impression on Ejro when delivering the supplies. The Hutt was so impressed he doubled <<1>>'s commission.
Playing Both Sides
The Hutt Cartel is supplying both factions in the Pedorian Civil War. They need someone willing to brave the battlefield and deliver shipments to both commanders.
<<1>> delivered weapons to both armies on Pedorian. One of the commanders was so grateful, he doubled <<1>>'s payment.
Hijacker Ambush
Someone has been hijacking the shipments of Wordro the Hutt. Send a companion to protect his latest delivery, and Wordro will cut you in on the profits.
<<1>> fought off the hijackers and exposed a traitor in Wordro's organization. The Hutt was so pleased he gave <<1>> a major bonus.
One Last Job
Groonor, a retired Chevin smuggler, has come back for one last job. He's delivering a weapons shipment through dangerous territory, and he needs a security escort.
Pirates attacked Groonor's shipment, but <<1>> saved the Chevin's life... and his cargo. Groonor was so grateful he offered a major bonus.
A New Market
The planet of Rumil recently passed a ban on personal blasters. Sensing opportunity, the Exchange wants to hire someone to deliver a supply of black market weapons to the world.
<<1>> evaded local authorities and delivered the blasters to Rumil. The Exchange contact was well pleased and offered <<1>> several choice items from the shipment.
No Hutts Allowed
To combat smuggling, Geldoll has banned all Hutt vessels and agents from the planet. Norbo the Hutt needs a fresh face to deliver his latest shipment.
<<1>> found an official willing to let the Hutts do business on Geldoll... for a price. The grateful Norbo insisted on giving <<1>> a bonus.
Crackdown
Authorities on Maateen have come down hard on illegal activities. The Exchange needs fresh blood to deliver a weapons shipment to the planet.
<<1>> found a way to bypass the authorities on Maateen. Using <<1>>'s method, the Exchange is back in business. Needless to say, they rewarded <<1>> handsomely.
Dangerous Merchants
You've recovered the holorecording of a distress message from a spice merchant in Hutt space. Send a companion to help the merchant.
<<1>> arrived to help the merchant, but it was an ambush. <<1>> thwarted the ambush and recovered the merchant's shipment.
Golden Aim
You've found the golden blaster of sharpshooter Hex Ordin, who has offered a reward to whoever finds it. Send your companion to negotiate a reward.
<<1>> found Hex Ordin and impressed him. He gave <<1>> an extra reward.
Mandalorian Mercenaries
Mandalorian mercenaries have set up camp on Arkanis. Send your companion to investigate their intentions.
<<1>> delivered the weapons. The Mandalorians were so impressed, they threw in a few special items as payment.
Pirate Queen
The infamous Sellia Cronus has a shipment of black market weapons for sale. Send your companion to make her an offer she can't refuse.
<<1>> was extremely persuasive. Sellia Cronus agreed to sell her weapons to the Empire, and she even threw in a little extra commission.
Forging Alliances
Allies on Mon Eron are expecting a shipment of black market weapons. Send your companion to secure the delivery.
The rebels on Mon Eron were extremely grateful for <<1>>'s help in providing them with arms to fight the Imperial occupation.
Double-cross
Smugglers in the Zhar system are transporting a weapons shipment for the Exchange. Send your companion to convince them to sell their cargo to you instead.
The smugglers refused to double-cross the Empire, but <<1>> still managed to secure the shipment for the Republic. The SIS was extremely grateful for the help.
New Deal
A pirate crew out of Carratos has been smuggling weapons for the Exchange. Send your companion to convince them to make new friends instead.
The pirate crew refused to switch sides, so <<1>> put them out of business. In the process, a small cache of high-tech weapons was recovered.
Sord Trunnel
Sord Trunnel, a high-ranking member of the Exchange, has been spotted on Byblos. Send your companion to strike up some fresh business.
<<1>> delivered Sord's shipment, but the unscrupulous gangster tried to renege on the payment. <<1>> made sure he paid what was due... plus a little extra.
Major Straken
Major Straken needs someone to deliver a shipment of weapons to allied forces on Serenno. Sounds like a job for one of your companions.
<<1>> fought off a Republic ambush on Serenno and delivered the weapons to the separatists. Major Straken was very impressed, and <<1>> was amply rewarded.
Rodian Greed
A Rodian smuggler stole a shipment of powerful weapons. He's looking to sell them for a substantial profit. Send your companion to negotiate.
<<1>> bargained the Rodian to a rock-bottom price. Imperial officials showed their gratitude by rewarding <<1>> with several valuable items from the shipment.
Neimoidian Cowardice
A Neimoidian black market broker, fearing enemy patrols, refuses to deliver arms to the Nevoota system. Send your companion to make the delivery.
Despite running across several Imperial patrols, <<1>> delivered the arms shipment. The Republic loyalists in the Nevoota system showed their gratitude with a substantial reward.
Exchanging Supplies
The Exchange is delivering black market weapons to their allies on Darada. Your companion could intercept the shipment.
<<1>> broke Imperial lines to deliver the shipment to the rebels on Dromund Fels, earning a bonus from the Exchange.
Paid Protection
A mysterious information broker needs protection while he conducts business on Anzat. Send your companion to watch his back.
One of the Anzati tried to assassinate the information broker, but <<1>> intervened. <<1>> received a bonus for good work.
Elusive Prey
A bounty hunter is paying for any leads on a slicer he's been tracking. Maybe your companion can dig up some info on the slicer's whereabouts.
<<1>> gave the bounty hunter a tip that led to the slicer's capture, and received a bonus for the assistance.
Spice Inflation
The authorities on Malastare are cracking down on the spice trade, causing prices to skyrocket. The Hutts want someone to sneak in a shipment of glitterstim.
The demand for spice on Malastare is higher than even the Hutts anticipated. <<1>> received a huge payout for the shipment.
Maintaining the Edge
Cartel enforcers on Saleucami need a steady supply of stims to stay in peak physical condition. Have your companion keep them well stocked.
Recent fighting with the local gangs has made the Cartel enforcers desperate for combat stims. They paid double for <<1>>'s shipment!
Archaeological Payoff
A crooked archaeologist is looking to sell a priceless Gree artifact. See if your companion can help him find a buyer.
<<1>> found a collector of Gree artifacts who was willing to pay extra. <<1>> received a substantial finder's fee.
Quick Exit
Kolbaa the Hutt's majordomo has fallen out of favor and needs to make himself scarce. Have your companion escort him to the Outer Rim.
Thanks to some fancy flying, <<1>> evaded the majordomo's pursuers and brought him safely to an isolated planet on the Outer Rim. The majordomo paid <<1>> extra for the trouble.
Shady Science
A private researcher needs fresh Kitonak lungs for an experiment he's conducting, no questions asked. Have your companion check the black market.
The researcher was so pleased with the quality of the Kitonak organs, <<1>> found that he paid double their market price.
Fancy Flying
A stellar dust cloud makes traveling to Kuras Three extremely dangerous. The Hutts need someone skillful to deliver some shock collars to the planet's surface.
<<1>> safely delivered the shock collars. The planet's inhabitants were so impressed that they offered a bonus to encourage future deliveries.
Human Trafficking
The Hutt Cartel underboss Julio Beni recently escaped incarceration and is in need of discreet transport back to Hutt space. Help Julio give the authorities the slip.

<<1>> found Julio surrounded by the authorities with no hope of escape, but a little quick thinking created a diversion that allowed <<1>> to help Julio give them the slip. The underboss was very appreciative.
Illicit Indulgences
Recent crackdowns on the spice trade has driven up the market's value exponentially. Have your companion capitalize on this trend while it lasts.
Competition in the spice trade was fierce, so fierce that <<1>> was able to take over for several other traders who met untimely ends.
The Business of Safety
You found a coded chart of pirate ambush locations along one of the major underworld trade routes. Have your companion sell the ambush locations to the highest bidder.
<<1>> sold the ambush locations for a high price to an anonymous merchant.
Completing the Collection
You've found a small sculpture of a rare striped gizka, one of only seven made. The Hutt Gorbus has the other six. Send a companion to find out what he'll pay to complete his collection.
Gorbus the Hutt paid double what the statue was worth, thanks to <<1>>'s persuasive efforts.
The Rodian's Revenge
You've come across a rare bottle of Somnaskol Red 337, rumored to be a favorite of an Exchange-connected bartender on Tatooine. Have your companion negotiate a price for the bottle.
<<1>> set off a bidding war for the bottle and secured an agreement with the Exchange to sell them other rare bottles.
Quashing the Saboteurs
Enemy saboteurs threaten the safety of the factory workers on Byblos. Send your companion to flush out the saboteurs.
<<1>> delivered the shipment to Livien, then helped the royal family crush the rebels. In appreciation, the royal family gave <<1>> a substantial bonus.
Arkanis Interception
The Exchange is shipping deadly weapons to mercenaries on Arkanis. Send your companion to intercept the shipment.
<<1>> delivered the Exchange shipment to the Mandalorian mercenaries on Arkanis. <<1>> also collected a commission from both sides, doubling the reward.
Double Identity
A captured pirate has turned out to be a deeply planted undercover agent. Have your companion arrange a believable escape and hide evidence of her government ties.
<<1>> convinced Ingor Watt to sell the stolen blasters back to the Empire at a reduced price. Imperial officials were so pleased they gave <<1>> a bonus.
Taking Down a Rival
Skeedo the Hutt wants someone to hijack a rival Hutt's shipment of arms to the local militia on Skeressa. He's willing to pay well.
<<1>> successfully hijacked the shipment from Offra the Hutt and delivered it to Skeedo. Skeedo was so impressed he offered <<1>> a bonus for the job.
A Simple Job
Offra the Hutt needs someone to deliver a shipment to the local militia on Skeressa. What could possibly go wrong?
Skeedo, a rival Hutt, hired Republic soldiers to hijack Offra's shipment. <<1>> thwarted the attempt. Offra was so impressed he gave <<1>> a bonus.
Access Allowed
A Rodian slicer has obtained access codes for a military base on Ambria. She'll sell them if your companion agrees to meet with her.
<<1>> obtained the Imperial access codes and delivered them to the Republic. The codes work for bases all over the galaxy.
A Winning Hand
Admiral Sevik is participating in a high-stakes pazaak tournament and needs a "competitive edge." Maybe your companion can improve his odds.
<<1>> slipped Admiral Sevik a trick pazaak deck that allowed him to win the tournament. Sevik was so pleased he gave <<1>> a portion of his winnings as payment.
Banned Beasts
The demand for illegal narglatch pets is at an all-time high. Have your companion procure the animals from Orto Plutonia.
<<1>> managed to find a particularly rare breed of narglatch and delivered them to an animal trader on Coruscant for a hefty bonus.
Ransom Demands
Kidnappers are holding industrialist Haemon Laer for ransom. Send your companion to the rescue!
<<1>> milked the Organas for every possible credit before releasing Haemon Alde. You received a substantial cut of the payoff.
Mystery Ordnance
A kidnapping ring on Sullust is acquiring military-grade weapons from an unknown source. Send your companion to investigate.
The Sullustan rebels were about to start a major offensive and were grateful for the extra firepower. <<1>> received a substantial payout.
A Tiny Cut
A local crimeboss suspects one of his spice distributors of cutting his product and skimming the profits. The boss would like to hire a chaperone to protect his interests.
<<1>> caught the dealer stealing product from his employer and turned him in for a tidy bonus from the crimeboss.
Back-alley Bartering
Nar Shaddaa, the smuggler's moon, is a place to find anything if you know where to look. Send a companion to locate fenced goods at a bargain.
<<1>> encounters a fence looking to offload some hot product and isn't worried about making a profit so long as the goods disappear.
Working the Market
The galactic black market is an ever-changing arena, where being in the know is as important as being in demand. Send a companion to get the latest word on the street.
<<1>> caught wind of a heist being planned on a local number-running operation and tipped the bookie off for a sizable reward.
Detour
A local arms dealer is interested in obtaining some new stock, specifically from a transport slated to leave the sector in the next few hours.
In a brilliant stroke of luck, <<1>> caught the sloppy pilot leaving his ship unattended and made off with the entire shuttle.
Trust Issues
The Cortez banking clan is pushing for new regulations that would render underworld loan schemes obsolete. Several syndicates are seeking a neutral representative to protect their interests.
<<1>>, with the help of the crime syndicates' vicious reputations, convinced the Cortez clan to abandon their controversial plans.
Too Hot to Handle
A jewel thief inadvertently stole a priceless bangle commissioned for the wedding of a powerful crimelord's daughter. He needs someone to help him smooth things over.
<<1>> convinced the crimelord to purchase the bangle from the thief for a fraction of what the jeweler would have charged, leaving everyone happy, except the jeweler of course.
Overpossessive
A popular club on Nar Shaddaa is having trouble with a wealthy patron whose obsession with one of the dancers is hurting business. Management needs someone connected to sort things out.
<<1>> convinced the club to sell the dancer to the obsessed patron for a premium and arranged for a few replacement dancers to take over.
The Spice of Life
A new spice mixture has become all the rage among the wealthy and famous due to dubious claims of its rejuvenating effects. Send a companion to find this new wonder.
<<1>> convinced the spice mixer that having someone like you on their customer list would go a long way for their reputation and returned with a large stash.
Crossing the Line
After months of overstepping the boundaries of his territory, Hutt Cartel members bordering Bormo the Hutt desire a mercenary to deliver an ultimatum and exact tribute.
<<1>> puts on a good show while delivering the ultimatum, putting the cowardly Hutt in his place and exacting a pricey tribute for the Cartel.
Political Favors
The governor of a Mid Rim world on the borders of Hutt space is expecting a campaign donation from the Hutt Cartel. A discreet courier is needed for the delivery.
<<1>>'s meeting with the governor went so well he decided to introduce <<1>> to some of his other contributors and business partners.
Unauthorized R & R
A garrison on Sullust is paying handsomely for recreational contraband. Send a companion to deliver the goods.
<<1>> brought the Imperial troops a shipment of holovids, pazaak decks and Corellian ale. <<1>> was paid handsomely for the goods.
Double Exposure
A journalist in possession of compromising holo-images of a government official and an Exchange boss is demanding hush money. The victims want to ensure the journalist's silence.
<<1>> convinced the journalist that they wouldn't get any money without handing over the original holos and lured the blackmailer into a trap.
Stimulating Business
You've found a sample of a potent new stim that could make you rich. Send your companion to negotiate with the manufacturer and distribute the stim.
<<1>> negotiated sole distribution rights and brought back a tidy profit.
A Noble's Ransom
You've discovered a slave trade manifest with the names of several minor Alderaanian nobles on the list of slaves. Send your companion to free the nobles and collect a reward from their families.
<<1>> managed to free the nobles and receive top credits from their grateful relations.
May the Best Cheater Win
A datapad details the methods used by a wealthy gambler to cheat at the sabacc tables on Nar Shaddaa. Send your companion to beat the gambler at his own game.
<<1>> beat the gambler and won the pot, without getting caught.
Sword Fodder
The weapon masters of Atrisia need hardened warriors to test their students. Have your companion recruit skilled fighters for the task.
<<1>> managed to find some captured Morgukai warriors and delivered them to Korriban. The overseers were very pleased by this find and paid extra.
Stolen Plans
A Blastech engineer has offered to sell prototype weapon designs to the highest bidder. Send a companion to investigate.
<<1>> received the experimental Czerka designs and delivered them to the Empire.
An Unhealthy Loan
Ban Wan Pollo, a smuggler with valuable connections, has gotten himself into debt with the Hutt Cartel. He wants someone to have his back while making his next payment.
Having associates of your reputation helped the smuggler renegotiate the terms of his repayment, and he couldn't have been more grateful.
Tribute
The Hutts have categorically raised the tribute they collect from a number of worlds under their control. Send your companion to find out where the extra credits are going.
The Tal Nami were surprisingly welcoming, and not wanting to further aggravate the Hutts, they provided an offering and promised more when they could manage it.
Military Takeover
A wealthy general on Iseno is planning a coup. Send your companion with a shipment of military-grade weaponry to secure his reign.
<<1>> delivered the weapons to the renegade general. He was so grateful he gave <<1>> a bonus and promised to ally with the Empire.
Silencing the Snitch
Bounty hunters have nabbed a Cartel informant who tried to flee. Have your companion deliver the snitch to the Hutts.
<<1>> delivered the snitch as promised. The Hutts were especially happy to get their hands on the informant, and paid <<1>> double.
A New Home
War refugees are hoping to make a fresh start in safer territory. They just need someone with connections to set them up with identification papers.
<<1>> obtained some forged identification papers for the Imperial refugees. The refugees were so grateful they gave <<1>> a token of their appreciation.
Experimental Joyride
The pirate Shelas Biiks has hijacked an experimental warship and plans to auction it off. Send a companion to make an offer.
<<1>> met with Shelas and purchased the Imperial starship on behalf of the Republic.
Uplifting Spirits
A fledgling distillery in the Outer Rim boasts a potent new brew banned in fifty-eight systems. Have your companion help ship the swill to the greater galaxy.
<<1>>'s success trading the illicit beverages nearly tripled the brewer's demand and the distillers gladly shared their appreciation.
Questionable Content
Shu-meedo is a violent Rodian entertainment dating back to Rodia's prehistory--but it's been banned throughout much of the galaxy. Send your companion to smuggle shu-meedo holorecordings.
<<1>>'s dealings with knockoff shu-meedo holos resulted in an unexpected but friendly relationship with a Rodian bounty hunting guild.
Passing On the Business
An aged, retiring pirate is looking for a worthy successor to inherit his legacy. Put your companion forth as a candidate.
The pirate was more than impressed with <<1>>, waving off all other contenders for his inheritance.
Overdue
A shipment of Hutt weapons bound for a Houk gang on Lijuter never arrived--or so the gang claims. The Hutt Cartel wants the matter settled; send your companion.
<<1>> set up a fake arms deal with the Houk gang, which attempted to steal this second batch of weapons as well. When the smoke cleared, <<1>> returned the goods and the Hutts were quite pleased.
Into the Sabacc Pit

The gambler Zarro Flynn is organizing a sabacc tournament on Nar Shaddaa. Although it's invitation only, there will be plenty of other opportunities for the savvy black marketeer; send your companion.
<<1>> hit it big when an overconfident Zeltron gambler put up some rare possessions as collateral on a loan and promptly lost.
One-Sided Relationships
The devoted slave of an exiled Alderaanian noble is seeking artifacts from her master's homeworld. Have your companion arrange a trade.
<<1>> delivered a beautiful set of Alderaanian jewels to the slave, who, while paying, rambled on about wearing them when her master finally takes her as a lady of the court.
Feeding the People
Famine has broken out on Dubrillion and its inhabitants are desperate for food. Have your companion bring supplies to win the people's credits and loyalty.
<<1>> brought food and supplies to Dubrillion. The citizens were so grateful for the supplies that they paid extra.
Arbitration
A pirate wants to offload some stolen tech to a local fence, but neither trusts the other. Send your companion to act as neutral party.
The trade went off without a hitch, and <<1>> was rewarded by both parties for remaining impartial.
Ancient Armament
A wealthy collector is looking to buy an ancient Rakata blaster that's rumored to be on the market. Have your companion set up the deal.
<<1>> convinced the seller that the old Rakata blaster was just junk, making a nice profit reselling it to the collector.
Hide in Plain Sight
A smuggler looking to ply his wares to your government needs false identification to pass through enemy checkpoints. Send your companion to help him out.
With <<1>>'s help, the smuggler obtained everything he needed to slip through enemy security without detection.
Denied
The datapad you found is an order for emergency supplies to support a pirate blockade. Have your companion intercept the shipment and end the pirates' predations.
<<1>> intercepted the shuttle carrying the pirate supplies, rerouting it to friendly forces.
Winning Ace
The pazaak card you found is one often believed necessary to create the "perfect" deck. Have your companion find a buyer for it.
<<1>> contacted an obsessive collector to sell the pazaak card. The collector was happy to pay the named price.
Costly Justice
A vigilante has assassinated key members of the Hutt Cartel. Send your companion to offer help as a bodyguard.
The Imperial bureaucrat was so intimidated by the Hutt demands that he caved immediately--and even threw in a bribe for <<1>> just to keep things civil.
Exchange Envy
A museum curator is chafing at the illegal acquisition of a valuable painting by an Exchange underboss. Use your companion as a go-between to arrange a trade.
It turned out that the Exchange boss had little to no knowledge of art and parted with his rare original for an easily replicated piece of kitsch.
Shakedown
The Hutt Cartel feels that the Vippit species was ungenerous in its most recent tribute. Your companion can collect anything the Vippits were holding back.
The Vippits caved the moment <<1>> arrived and handed over everything of value to appease their greedy Hutt masters.
Cherished Memento
Colonel Gisseran reports that a valuable souvenir from ruins of Taris was stolen. Have your companion comb the black market for it.
<<1>> located the fence who bought the Moff's stolen souvenir--and who also gave up the name of the thief.
Special Delivery
Special forces operating deep in enemy territory are running out of supplies. Have your companion smuggle munitions to them.
<<1>>'s presence was highly effective in persuading an arms dealer to be generous with his shipments to the Imperial strike teams.
Incriminating Footage
Blackmailers have obtained several compromising holovids of General Nohrwan. Have your companion meet with the blackmailers on the general's behalf.
<<1>> recovered the incriminating holovids and returned them to the Senator. The Senator was so relieved he paid extra.
Secret Vices
An influential general has asked you to deliver some sensitive items to his estate on Ord Biniir. Have your companion make the drop.
<<1>> delivered the general's package to Ord Biniir and was paid extra for avoiding detection.
For the Troops
Troop morale on Hollast Seven is dangerously low. Have your companion smuggle in some recreational contraband to lift the soldiers' spirits.
<<1>> brought the Republic troops a shipment of holovids, pazaak decks and Corellian ale. <<1>> was paid handsomely for the goods.
Blockade Run
The plague-ridden planet of Joralla has been officially quarantined. Have your companion sneak medicine past the blockade to win the inhabitants' support.
<<1>> smuggled the medicine past the Imperial blockade and was rewarded by an exceedingly grateful citizenry.
Behind Imperial Lines
Allied spies need someone discreet to smuggle them into enemy space. Send your companion.
<<1>> smuggled the SIS agents into Imperial space without being detected. The agents offered a bonus for your assistance.
Irreplaceable Parts
Wen Lu-Dasz, an eccentric and wealthy merchant, needs replacement parts for his yacht. They cannot be bought through normal channels; have your companion make arrangements.
<<1>> secured a deal that should make Wen's yacht run flawlessly for some time.
No Redeeming Value
The holodramas of Leero the Hutt, self-proclaimed director and artist, are so devoid of taste that they aren't sold freely even in Hutt space. Have your companion help Leero change that.
In an unusual turn of events, <<1>> discovered a primitive species that treats Leero the Hutt's holodramas as divine messages. The aliens happily traded their wealth for the discs.
Desperation
An Alderaanian noble has gone bankrupt and is selling off family heirlooms to support himself. Send your companion to grab some valuables on the cheap.
<<1>> made a tidy profit reselling the Alderaanian heirlooms in less scrupulous markets.
Planting the Seeds
A new colony in the Meridian Sector is ripe for black market trade. Have your companion scope out some promising territory.
<<1>> made contact with some ambitious local businessmen and laid the groundwork for future trading in the Meridian Sector.
Table Talk
A group of infamous smugglers hosts a monthly sabacc game where the participants make secret deals. Send your companion to infiltrate the game.
<<1>> posed as the dealer for the sabacc game, listening in as the smugglers planned upcoming jobs.
Assemble Your Team
Two-Eyes Taravak, the Gran crime lord, is gathering some specialists for a high-stakes heist. Send your companion to join up.
Despite some complications, <<1>> rescued the operation and pulled off the heist, receiving a double share from Two-Eyes.
Breaking In
The Greased Wheel black market trade ring has exclusive access to some valuable goods and trade routes. Send your companion to mingle and make some new contacts.
<<1>> set up a meeting with a member of the black market trade ring and secured a few lucrative deals along its secret routes.
Match Fixing
The Hutt Cartel has put forth a champion for an underground dueling league. Send your companion to make sure the cartel fighter is a sure winner.
<<1>> pulled some strings to fix the upcoming fights, making sure the Hutt fighter becomes undefeated.
Fair Play
To ensure no foul play in an upcoming deal, a black marketeer wants a well-known name present to ward off trouble. Your companion fits the bill perfectly.
The unexpected presence of <<1>> unnerved any would-be troublemakers, making the deal a tense but safe affair.
Consolidation
The fractured criminal gangs in the Orus Sector could be a powerful force if united. Send your companion to set up a deal between the gang leaders.
The disparate gangs agreed to form an alliance thanks to <<1>>, who is now owed favors from each of the gang leaders.
Intellectual Property
You found plans for a prototype hyperdrive, likely stolen as an act of corporate espionage. The owners would likely reward whoever returned the blueprint.
<<1>> persuaded the company to provide more of a reward than planned for the prototype hyperdrive blueprint.
Hijack
The ledger you found mentions the delivery of a luxury starship to a noble in the Cadriaan Province. Send your companion to steal it during transit.
<<1>> posed as the replacement pilot of the luxury ship on the last leg of its journey, then took it to a fence to sell it off.
The Sinews of War
A wealthy military officer is unsatisfied with his standard-issue gear. Have your companion deliver some top-quality black market equipment.
The officer paid top credits to <<1>> for finding a high-tech sidearm and personal body armor.
No Competition
Umu'ro the Hutt owns several starship module factories and is looking to deal with new clients. Send your companion to negotiate the terms.
<<1>> talked circles around the Hutt, setting down highly favorable terms for the Empire.
A Volatile Gift
A governor in the Thanium Sector needs a criminal warehouse filled with spice and weapons destroyed. Have your companion deliver a special package to the warehouse for him.
<<1>> handed the package over to the criminals in the warehouse and left in time to see the building go up in flames soon afterwards.
Gaining Favor
A newly elected governor is looking to build ties with the Hutt Cartel. Have your companion make introductions.
The Sith Lord has started to build a sizable power base in the underworld and is deeply indebted to <<1>> for making that happen.
Discreet Exit
A key spy is in dire need of extraction. Your companion could find him without being detected.
<<1>> managed to contact the spy and get him through Republic customs, escaping to deep space before Coruscant officials realized their mistake.
Meds for Vets
A local stim trader is charging high prices for medicine to veterans on Ebra. Send your companion to convince him to be more reasonable.
<<1>>'s presence was highly effective in persuading the stim trader to be a little more generous with his prices.
Shattering Their Chains
Plans for a slave rebellion are brewing on Da Soocha, unnoticed by the slaves' masters. Sending your companion could tip the scales whichever way you choose.
The slaves overthrew their cruel masters, and many owe their freedom to <<1>>.
Well-Earned Rest
Admiral Hoske is offering his crew some R&R to celebrate his recent promotion. Have your companion deliver some special goods to liven up the party.
