<<1>> delivered exotic food and drinks only available through nonstandard channels, and the admiral paid well for them.
A Better Life
A disillusioned pirate wants to have her family smuggled to a neutral world for a fresh start. Have your companion assist.
<<1>> took the Sith's child without drawing attention from the Empire, delivering him safely to the temple on Tython.
Vital Intel
A datapad containing vital information has fallen into enemy hands. Your companion could retrieve it before they realize what they have.
<<1>> had to call in favors from a broad range of contacts, but the SIS datapad eventually found its way into the right hands.

<<1>> has completed the assignment with extraordinary skill, and returned with a bonus reward!
Discovery of the Duros
New ruins have revealed that the Duros may have established offworld colonies even earlier than previously thought. Have your companion evaluate these findings.
Violent Excavation
Aerial bombings have exposed many ancient ruins beneath Corellia's cities. Send your companion to analyze these newly-exposed historical sites.
Exercise in Valuation
A Rodian antiquities collector is hoping to sell some choice pieces at a fair price. Your companion could help assess the items' value.
Starship Revival
A custom starship manufacturer is hoping to produce historically-accurate reproductions of ancient vessels to sell to wealthy collectors and museums. Your companion could act as an expert consultant.
Seline's Secrets
More ancient Gree ruins have been discovered on the planet Seline. Have your companion explore these marvels before the enemy can.
Beneath the Wroshyr Trees
Burial sites uncovered in Kashyyyk's Shadowlands could reveal new information on the ancient history of the Wookiees. Have your companion aid the examination efforts.
Remnants of the Nazwa
Ancient Nazwa structures on the planet Baroonda have been largely ignored by the galactic scientific community. Send your companion to conduct a more thorough study of these ruins.
Swords of Atrisia
A treasure hunter claims to have recovered the Jar'Kai blades of one of the first Yovshin Swordsmen of Atrisia. Your companion could help confirm that the blades are genuine.
Solving the Equation
The artifact you've recovered appears to be a Quilan Pyradex, one of only a handful ever found. Have your companion investigate the mysterious origins of this rare object.

Memories of the Mythosaurs

Seeking Perfection

Shifting Treatment

Dewback Divergence
A hardy new breed of dewback has appeared in the deserts of Tatooine. Have your companion investigate its evolutionary origins.
Thrantas, Inc.
Alderaanian entrepreneurs are hoping to breed several subspecies of thranta capable of surviving on worlds with different atmospheric conditions. Your companion could serve as a valuable consultant.
Honored Lineages
Several Kuati nobles are concerned that the heir to their leading house might be illegitimate. If your companion could confirm the truth discreetly, these aristocrats would be tremendously grateful.
Preventative Measures
The data fragments you've found contain technical specifications for a deadly viral weapon. Have your companion report the situation and help to develop a treatment before the weapon can be used.

Orbital Graveyard

Lost Among Ghosts

Urgent Recruitment
A Squib salvage team needs another pair of hands before they can set out on their latest scrap run. Volunteer your companion for the job.
High-Speed Opportunities
The Kolaador Speeder Derby blazes a path of mechanical mayhem hundreds of kilometers long each year. Have your companion follow along and watch for any choice salvage.
Liberated Tech
Many ancient and powerful weapons have been found in the dangerous subterranean vaults on Belsavis. Send your companion to look for more.
No Peace in Sight
Ongoing battles between the noble houses of Alderaan have left vast fortunes buried in rubble. Send your companion to do some digging and see what turns up.
Shards of the Blockade

You've discovered pieces of the Beskad, a Mandalorian warship thought to have been lost in a black hole along the Hydian Way. This wreckage proves that the ship must have crashed elsewhere; send your companion to find the true crash site.

Unreliable Allies

The Insider
A Holowan security chief suspects a disgruntled employee is behind the constant sabotage of company data, but can't prove it. Send your companion to uncover the slicer's identity.
Return Volley
Vital military systems have been besieged for days by scores of opposition slicers. Have your companion turn the tables by orchestrating a massive counteroffensive on their systems.
Defenseless
A self-replicating maintenance program has malfunctioned, corrupting deflector shield controls on several starfighters. Have your companion eliminate the program and rebuild the faulty systems.
Fast as You Can
The target of this cycle's Slicer Sprint has been announced: the Czerka Corp mainframe at their headquarters. You know your companion can't resist going for the win.
Watching the Watchdogs
The so-called "Data Stewards" have been unveiling top-level secrets from planetary governments across multiple sectors. Have your companion discover their means of data extraction.
Credit Drain
The reserves of Denon's top thirty corporations have all been suddenly and mysteriously purged of their credits. Have your companion look into the source of this apparent act of mass embezzlement.
Unsliceable?
Your faction has intercepted a diplomatic cruiser with no crew and no discernible items of value--save for an "unsliceable" computer terminal. Let your companion show them there's no such thing.
Trade Invader
You found intricate design notes for a slicing routine that would grant full access to Galactic Trade Network transaction logs. See if your companion can see the notes through to fruition.

Return on Investment

A prominent interplanetary shipping magnate got his start with a loan from the Exchange. The organization now expects the businessman to repay them with a large cut of his vast fortune, and they think your companion could help "motivate" him to pay.
Vertical Mobility

A coalition of Evocii has managed to scrape together enough credits to buy several properties on Nar Shaddaa, but the Hutts are trying to nullify the deal. Send your companion to persuade the Hutts to accept the money and leave the Evocii in peace.
The Business of Battle

Investors in a Skakoan weapons manufacturer are concerned that the company seems to be shifting toward non-military projects. Have your companion convince the manufacturer that war is good for business.
Improving Methodology
Several biotechnology firms on Sleheyron have been purchasing slaves for use as test subjects. Have your companion persuade them to use more ethical testing procedures.
Choices and Consequences

A formerly neutral planet in the Mid Rim is now welcoming ambassadors from both the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Be sure your companion goes along and clarifies the risks of joining your enemies.
The Bacta Cartel

Thyferran businessmen are attempting to persuade the world's bacta exporters to artificially raise the healing substance's price to increase profits. Send your companion to convince them that the cost in lives would be too high.
Prioritizing Needs

Zeltron relief workers are attempting to deliver medical supplies to civilians near a frontline battle zone. Your companion could convince them that everyone would be better off if those supplies go to your army's troops instead.
Seeds on the Wind
Ithorian botanists are hoping to gain support to repair the ecologies of war-torn planets regardless of which side controls them. Have your companion help the Ithorians gain the funding they need.
Reforging the Chains
Hutt crime lords on Ylesia are becoming concerned about the possibility of a slave uprising on their world. Send your companion to convince the slaves that they're better off as they are.
Arms Proliferation
Renegade Balmorrans have spread the word that they'd be willing to sell biological weapons on the black market. Send your companion to convince them to destroy these terrible devices instead.
Restricted Access
The Columi have recently made radical advancements in cybernetic limb technology. Send your companion to ensure that they only share these developments with your faction's military.
Fuel for Hope

Karakan orbital stations are refusing to refuel your faction's medical ships, fearing that this would breach their neutral stance in the war. Send your companion to alleviate their fears and work out a fair price.
Marauding Negotiations

The data you've found indicates that prominent politicians on the neutral planet Caramm V have been secretly funding pirate activities in their sector. Your companion could use the data to blackmail these politicians into ending Caramm V's neutrality.
Deep-Sea Diplomacy

You've recovered fragments of an ancient peace treaty between the Quarren and Mon Calamari peoples. Have your companion deliver these fragments to hopefully contribute to a lasting peace between the two species.

Medical Emergency

An esteemed Carosite doctor has resurfaced after going missing more than five years ago. The doctor has no memories of his time away; your companion could help him determine who was behind the strange kidnapping.
Background Check

A new coalition of high-priced mercenaries is offering their services in the war--but at an exorbitant price. Have your companion investigate whether these fighters' past service is really worth the price.
Criminal Engineering
The head of a biotechnology firm on Corvis Minor IV believes one of her rivals has stolen her scientists' work. Send your companion to find the proof.
Anything to Win
Famed racer Kolo "Lightning" Lovek has recently suffered a series of high-profile losses. Lovek suspects his rivals have been sabotaging his swoop bike, but your companion could find out for sure.
AWOL
A prototype warship with tremendous destructive capabilities has disappeared in the middle of its final test flight. Have your companion join the search effort.
Raids and Retaliation

The pirates known as the Orixon Raiders have destroyed dozens of starships in a matter of days. Send your companion to track down the Raiders' hideout so that their attacks can be brought to a swift end.
Hostile Workplace
Officials from a tibanna gas mining platform suspect several of their employees of industrial sabotage. They would gladly compensate your companion for helping them identify the correct culprits.
Early Exit
The murder of a popular holodrama actor has authorities baffled. Send your companion to lend a hand with the hunt for the killer.
Seeping Suspicions
Critical wells on Socorro have suddenly run dry, threatening lives in dozens of desert settlements. Have your companion look for signs of sabotage.
Bidders and Burglars
Several valuable items have been stolen from Nar Shaddaa's premier auction house. If your companion can find the thief, the auctioneers are sure to offer a generous reward.
Round Two

A famed Mandalorian warrior is offering a substantial reward to anyone who can determine the identity of a masked opponent he fought to a draw during a battle on Circarpous V. Have your companion help the Mandalorian get the rematch he's craving.
Plugging Leaks

Pirates have been repeatedly preying on an Ishi Tib cruise ship, intercepting it regardless of which hyperroutes it travels on. Your companion could help the ship's crew determine how the pirates track them so easily.
Green Concave
The ornate dagger you've found is covered in Gree markings. Have your companion trace the strange weapon back to its makers and learn how it left their possession.
Silence in the Rift

You've discovered the report of a starship captain who claims to have been followed by a silver, spheroid vessel of unknown origin while traveling near the Kathol Rift. Send your companion to learn whether there is any truth to the report--and where the strange ship might have come from.

Loose Change

The markings on this well-worn credit chip suggest that it came from one of the hidden treasure hoards of a long-dead Sanyassan warlord. Perhaps your companion could trace the chip back to the rest of the treasure....

Continuity Break

Rock walls built along a series of mountain bases on Qalydon chart the progression of its people as a culture--save for one untouched mountain in the midst of it all. See if your companion can determine what was so special about that mountain.

Rishii elders speak with hesitation of an old village believed to be haunted by its final occupants. Encourage your companion to explore the remote and ominous locale.

The classified documents in your possession speak of an ambassador from Zaadja nearing an agreement to side with the enemy. Send your companion to eliminate any chance of the accord going through.
First Shot of Freedom

The Foundation of Freedom, a blaster now in your possession, was allegedly stolen by the government of Merisee from its separatist moon, Meriso. Your companion can end the resultant war by returning the symbolic weapon to the moon.

Moderate Yield: Grade 8 Medical Supplies
Abundant Yield: Grade 8 Medical Supplies
Bountiful Yield: Grade 8 Medical Supplies
Rich Yield: Grade 8 Medical Supplies
Wealthy Yield: Grade 8 Medical Supplies
No More Words
Mechis 3 union commissioner Mogg Wacho is making a lot of noise about his displeasure over your faction's policies. Have your companion provide the man with ample motivation to quiet down.
Sour Note
A popular cantina band on tour in the Cha Raaba system has been kidnapped by the Kanawyn Syndicate. Have your companion negotiate the band's safe release.
Bumpy Ride

Vectron is considering the production of a line of vehicles exclusive to the opposing faction. Your companion should make the corporation's board of directors realize just how short-term their thinking is.
Most Favored
The governments of Murkhana and Repea are looking for an impartial third party to arbitrate their inaugural trade terms. Send your companion to act as intermediary.
Crime Wave
Chagrian competitive swimmer Torrig Omal is being sought in connection with a series of kolto thefts on Manaan. The Order of Shasa would appreciate your companion's assistance in locating Omal.
Unlikely Habitat
The lifeless world Alortha is now inundated with signs of technological activity. Have your companion set a course for the sweltering planet to determine what's behind all the commotion.
Voyage to Phorliss
Houks are leaving their homeworld of Lijuter by the shipload for Phorliss. It might be a good idea for your companion to look into the reason for the mass exodus.
Death of a Statesman

Bewilderment over the unsolved murder of a popular governor has the ethnic factions of Tandankin pointing fingers at one another. Have your companion determine the true cause before their world descends into chaos.
Tholothian Massacres
Force-sensitive adults on Tholoth are inexplicably turning homicidal. Tell your companion to throw on some protective gear before looking into the matter.
A Nebulous Fate
A Galactic Solutions Industries convoy has gone missing after entering the Spawn Nebula. Keep up your faction's relationship with GSI by sending your companion to look for their ships.
Primal Force
A remote commune of Force-sensitive primitives has been discovered by a noted anthropologist on Radnor. Send your companion to observe their ways.
Shrouded Identities

A small-time droid manufacturer appears to have been mass producing robotic doubles for a freelance spy known as the Shroud. Have your companion scour the factory for clues as to the notorious outlaw's whereabouts.
Astromech Revolt
The holorecording in your possession depicts several astromech droids turning on their master aboard his ship. Get your companion to take a trip to the Rhuvia system to see what's going on.
Dark in the Shot
This blaster's barrel appears to be inscribed with complex Sith runes. Have your companion trace the curious weapon back to its original owner to learn its history.
Moderate Yield: Grade 8 Researched Compounds
Abundant Yield: Grade 8 Researched Compounds
Bountiful Yield: Grade 8 Researched Compounds
Rich Yield: Grade 8 Researched Compounds
Wealthy Yield: Grade 8 Researched Compounds and Rank 5 Companion Gifts
Second Opinion
Pirates native to Rishi have been bragging about stealing "the mother of all gems." Have your companion tail them to see what they've really got.
Fortress of Fortune
One asteroid in the Choah Belt is said to have once been used as a hideout by long-dead crime lord Shisha Mor. Let your companion do a little rock hopping in search of it.
Fine Tuning

The Great Antennae of the insectoid Verpine has been missing for centuries, but recently discovered radio waves point to it being in the Fradian system. See if your companion can locate the revered antiquity.
Crown of Sand
A Vodran pirate crew has taken possession of the Sand Crown of Ruul, a significant artifact of the Weequay. Surely your companion wouldn't mind taking the crown off the Vodrans' hands.
Sign of the Stars
A star map discovered inside an ancient shipwreck on Rishi points to a dig site on nearby Molavar. Send your companion to look into it.
Dust to Diamond
Rumors abound that the diamond-compressed remains of famous author Custo Ramak, stolen during the battle for Corellia, are now on Nar Shaddaa. Get your companion in on the hunt.
The Gems of Gargon
Old mining drills on Gargon are said to have used rare Corusca gems to break through the metal-dense crust. Have your companion see if any of the valuable gems were left behind.
The Long Way There

Island markings seen from the sky by observant Rishii seem to form a puzzle that, when solved, will reveal the location of a cache of valuable coins. Have your companion put on their thinking cap and solve the puzzle.
Death's Intricate Door
The schematics in your possession demystify the mechanics of the complex locking mechanism used on a House of Tion tomb. Have your companion access the tomb and explore its mysteries.
Trappings
Etchings on the ceremonial blades you found tell of a greedy warlord who was crushed to death under the weight of his own riches. Send your companion to find out if there's any truth to the parable.

Potable Powder Keg
Due to its violently adverse effects on several species, Gamorrean "detonator ale" is banned across much of the known galaxy. You could do well by having your companion smuggle a shipment to Rishi.
A Nautolan's Best Friend
A popular Nautolan musician would like very much to own a pair of ginxes, which are banned as pets on Glee Anselm. Have your companion work out a plan to get her what she desires.
Of Art and Suffering

Under threat of death for producing non-functional replicas of the lightsabers of Dark Council members, artist Aurenia is looking for safe haven. You'll be well compensated if your companion assists in Aurenia's relocation.
Price Hop

A Hutt plantation on Klatooine would like someone to "steal" this year's paddy frog harvest and sell the delicacy at a markup so they can charge more without raising the ire of other Hutts. Send your companion to make some credits.
Gold = Good
An eccentric admiral has hinted that he'd like to possess the gold-plated astromech owned by Garblaque the Hutt. Just the kind of everyday, normal arrangement your companion would love to sort out.
Pawns of the Dark Side

A collector of chess pieces carved from terentatek tusks needs one more to complete her set but her sculptor is out of raw materials. The collector will see you're properly compensated if your companion can come through.
An Unusual Bloom
A pharmaceutical company seeks an extremely rare and widely banned flower that can be dried, ground and ingested for medicinal purposes. Send your companion to Durace to pick some likely candidates.
Under Threat of Death

Nyemarians fleeing a global civil war are seeking refuge on any world that will accept them, even though their own sect has vowed that deserters will die. Have your companion arrange for their safe passage.
Aged to Perfection
You have obtained a misplaced transport order for two dozen crates of humbaba curds, a rare delicacy. Send your companion to Kashoon to pose as the contracted shipper.
Smuggler's Delight
Unused landing codes for the Manaan Mercantile Plaza, such as the ones you now possess, are just about the hottest ticket in the smuggling community. Have your companion put out a call for bids.

Grade 10
Finders Keepers
You have recovered an abandoned smuggling vessel near Balosar filled with priceless cargo. Have your companion arrange an auction with the usual suspects.
The Cost of Freedom
A host of Twi'lek slaves are seeking refuge after robbing their master, noted criminal Boss Huvaa. Instruct your companion to find them a safe haven--for a fair price.
Off to the Races

You have secured a pair of prized tickets to Malika Sturm's centennial thranta race in the upper atmosphere of Alderaan. Rather than let the tickets go to waste, have your companion sell them to the highest bidder.
Running Scared
A desperate smuggler is on the run after selling a fake supply of isotope-5 to the wrong Hutt. Send your companion to arrange his safe passage to Wild Space.
Something Fishy
A high ranking official on Manaan wants a breeding pair of endangered Geesa Sharks for her personal aquarium. Instruct your companion to facilitate the acquisition without drawing unwanted attention.
Statue of Limitations
An anonymous art dealer is selling a work by famed sculptor Yerla Tasso that recently disappeared from a Kiffar museum. Send your companion to help coordinate the secret auction.
Growing Suspicions
An Ithorian in dire financial straits has a large insurance policy on his garden estate. Maybe your companion can figure out a way to help him collect.
A Hero's Legacy
A senator from Coruscant wants to discreetly sell his great-grandfather's war medals to raise money for his campaign. Send your companion to help facilitate the secret deal.
Off the Radar
Corellian Engineering Corporation is rumored to be developing experimental stealth technology for an unknown client. Send your companion to gather intel on the plans and the mysterious buyer.
Broken Broker

An information broker operating under the codename Proctor Six has amassed a wealth of intel on the most influential leaders in the Sith Empire and the Republic. Maybe your companion can relieve her of this valuable data.
Wheeling and Dealing

A mid-level executive at SoroSuub Corporation is siphoning company profits to his offworld accounts on Nar Shaddaa. See if your companion can freeze those accounts--and ransom them back to the crooked exec.
Turning the Tables

A group of rogue slicers has compromised the private accounts of galactic celebrities and released their personal records to the public. Have your companion track the anonymous slicers down and expose their true identities.
Blame the Messenger

There have been several failed attempts to intercept secure signals from one of your long-range comm beacons. Send your companion to the beacon to slice into the network and track down whoever has been trying to get in.
Dirty Laundry

Ruthless financier Herron Morvis VII claims to have "confidential personal information" on dozens of corporate heads across the galaxy. Have your companion slice into his secure servers to find out what he knows.
Discount Travel Plan
Taerab Starship Manufacturing is rumored to have a hyperdrive prototype that will cut fuel costs in half. If your companion slices into their files, you could reap the benefits of their research.
You Can't Stop Progress

The Karflo Corporation has been buying innovative start-up companies and shelving their ideas to maintain their industrial monopoly. Have your companion slice into their databanks and find out what they're hiding.
Pages of the Past
A lost text from the great Duros philosopher Riv Garbi is rumored to have surfaced on his homeworld in a private collection. Have your companion investigate these rumors.
Guardian of Espirion
Researchers believe they have uncovered the lost resting place of the Master Handi, a legendary Espirion Jedi. Have your companion investigate the claims.
Underneath a Burning Sky

A long-abandoned city has been discovered in the lush rain forests of Moltok. Send your companion to investigate before the ancient settlement is buried under ash from the planet's endless volcanic activity.
The Tides of History
Recent seismic activity on the water world of Omereth has pushed a new archipelago to the surface. Have your companion investigate before the oceans swallow it up once more.
Secret Harvest

A large swath of farmland on the agrarian world of Ukio has shown high levels of synthetic materials in the soil, hinting there could be an ancient settlement buried beneath the crops. Send your companion to oversee the excavation.
A Chilling Discovery

Shifting glaciers on Hoth have exposed the remains of the Kettius Expedition, an ill-fated effort to conduct geological surveys of the ice-covered world. Have your companion seek out the historically valuable notes and diaries of Dr. Kettius.
Dry Run

When the Scarred Plains rhydonium reserve ran dry, the Abafar Extraction Conglomerate moved their operations to a new location. Have your companion search the abandoned drilling fields for anything worthwhile they may have left behind.
Opportunity Overload
After a reactor meltdown at the Eseg power plant on Delphon, the entire facility has been permanently quarantined. Tell your companion to grab a radiation suit and search the plant for useful items.
A Fine Estate of Affairs

In her will, wealthy industrialist, and infamous hoarder, Bazalle Geskrond declared all her worldly possessions "up for grabs." Dispatch your companion to fight the hordes rummaging through her junk in the hopes of finding something valuable.
Government Waste

Onderon's newly elected government has abandoned the previous administration's efforts to build a self-sufficient biodome beneath the planet's surface. Have your companion investigate the half-finished project for anything you might want.
Wonders of the Ancients
A long-abandoned Rakatan settlement has been discovered on one of the moons of Naboo. Send your companion to see if any of their technological marvels have survived the ages.
A Revolting Development

During a brief slave uprising on Sakiya, several Hutt Cartel warehouses were burned to the ground. While the Hutts are focused on bringing the Sakiyans back into line, your companion could scour the scorched ruins for useful salvage.
Cold Case, Hot Prospect

The centuries old wreckage of the Splendor--a missing Mirialan luxury cruiser--has been located in the lava fields of Promencious Four. Tell your companion to bring back anything useful that might have survived the crash.
Lunar Looting

For centuries, inhabitants of Iego have been trying--and failing--to colonize the thousand moons that orbit the world. Many of the abandoned colonies are still there, just waiting for your companion to investigate.
Into the Abyss

Weapons of mass destruction unleashed during Tinnel IV's civil war turned their capital into a smoking crater known only as The Abyss. Send your companion to explore the ruins and see if anything worthwhile has survived.
Orbital Free-For-All
The recent bankruptcy of Hakaba Net has led to widespread looting of their abandoned comm stations in the meteor rings orbiting Geonosis. Send your companion to get in on the action.
Hidden Paradise
A sudden sinkhole on Tatooine has exposed a massive underground oasis. Send your companion to investigate the unique flora and fauna before the desert storms swallow them up.
Get 'Em While They Last

Hunted to extinction for their delicious meat centuries ago, a small colony of sleeks has been discovered on a remote island of Fondor. Have your companion study these flightless birds before the locals' insatiable appetites wipe them out.
Seeds of Opportunity

An Ithorian botanist has engineered a more durable species of the beautiful, but infamously delicate, Golden Fire Blossom. Send your companion to acquire the seeds of this soon-to-be in high demand plant.
More Trouble with Gizka
A Gizka infestation has forced a quarantine of the cargo ports on Nal Hutta. Have your companion bait the ports with Gizka poison to eliminate the vermin.
A Berry a Day
Locals on Raxus attribute their above-average lifespans to the health benefits of the indigenous shemble-berry. Have your companion investigate the claims to see if there is any substance to them.
Fever Dream
A virulent strain of Vendaxian Fever has popped up in the slums of Coruscant. Dispatch your companion to vaccinate the local population... and make sure your own immunizations are up to date.
Tipping the Scales

The scales of the Phindian Zillik are highly resistant to a broad spectrum of solar radiation. If your companion can isolate the resistant properties, they could be used in ship shielding and protective gear.
Pollution Solution

The oceans of Mon Cala are patrolled by schools of Pliffer Fish--tiny creatures that feed on toxins. If your companion can acquire a breeding pair, they could be used to clean up industrial spills on other worlds.
Arboreal Armageddon
Gugal bloom, an invasive tree fungus, is decimating the forests of Ryloth. If your companion can find a way to curb the spread, the local authorities would be most grateful.
Rub a Grub
Excretions from the Sullustan drutash grub are being used as a folk cure for parasitic infections like Rodian rot-worm. Send your companion to investigate these claims.
Wreckage from an ancient, unidentified vessel has been discovered by a mining crew in the asteroid field surrounding Bothawui. Send your companion to investigate the crash site.
A Miner Inconvenience
